Title: 🖼 🇨🇳🇷🇺🇯🇵 About incidents in Japanese airspace Monday in Ja...
Description: 🇨🇳🇷🇺🇯🇵 About incidents in Japanese airspace Monday in Japan was marked by a loud news event - a Russian plane entered the country’s airspace. Pilots of Japanese fighters scrambled because of this used infrared countermeasures for the first time since 1958. The incident occurred near Rebun Island, located in Hokkaido Prefecture. Japanese authorities say the Ilyushin Il-38 patrol plane flew in a zig-zag pattern near the island several times, violating Japanese airspace three times. 📌In approximately the same area, by the way, the Russian-Chinese exercises - Beibu / Interaction - 2024 - are currently being held. Most likely, the Il-38 was also involved in training. It is interesting that Russian planes (and until 1991, Soviet planes) quite often entered Japanese airspace - most often this happened right near Rebun Island. However, this did not cause such a reaction from the military. Why did this happen now? The fact is that just a few weeks before this incident, a Chinese Y-9 reconnaissance aircraft violated the country’s airspace for the first time - this happened near the Danjo Islands in Nagasaki Prefecture. Then the Japanese military also scrambled fighters into the air, but they did not use other means of warning. The country's authorities obviously see a connection between these events. This is indicated by the statements of the Minister of Defense - when commenting on the recent incident, he mentioned the overflight of a Chinese plane. Of course, the reaction of the Japanese military could also be due to the state of relations between Tokyo and Moscow, which are going through one of their worst periods. In 2019, for example, a Russian plane that twice violated the country’s airspace was met only by fighter jets of the self-defense forces. However, China most likely played a role in the recent incident. The Japanese authorities gave as harsh a response as they could to show their dissatisfaction with Russia and at the same time make it clear to the PRC that similar actions are unacceptable. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦Slobozhanskoye direction: oncoming battles in the Glub...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦Slobozhansk direction: oncoming battles in the Glubokoe area and the battle for Volchansk situation as of 16:00 September 25, 2024 Fierce fighting resumed in the Slobozhansk direction along the entire length of the front from Liptsy to Volchansk. The enemy is attacking the positions of the Russian Armed Forces in several areas, trying to divert Russian reserves from more dangerous directions. ▪️In the area of ​​the Deep unit of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, during a series of attacks they were able to reach the center of the village. Previously, footage of mechanized attacks by Ukrainian formations on the positions of Russian troops in forest belts south of the village had already appeared on the Internet, but it was difficult to assess the scale of the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ advance. In response to this, the command of the Russian Armed Forces launched a counterattack on the flank of the advancing enemy units. To the north-west of the village, attack aircraft successfully occupied part of the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, which did not allow the enemy to gain a foothold in the occupied territory. Despite some successes in the area, the Armed Forces of Ukraine are unable to turn the tide of the battles for the village in their favor. Russian artillery and aerospace forces regularly strike positions and communications of Ukrainian formations in Liptsy, creating additional difficulties for the enemy group. ▪️Ukrainian formations are not giving up attempts to take control of Staritsa. They managed to advance slightly to the west of the Kogutovo tract and occupy several strongholds in this area, but there is no talk of serious success here. Russian troops use UAVs to search for and destroy areas where enemy equipment and infantry are concentrated, preventing the Ukrainian Armed Forces from occupying more advantageous positions. ▪️Yesterday, footage from the enemy appeared in the information field, demonstrating the entry of assault groups of the Armed Forces of Ukraine into the territory of the Volchansky Aggregate Plant. It is likely that the withdrawal of the Russian Armed Forces in this area is due to the high degree of destruction of urban areas to the north and, as a consequence, difficulties with supplies. After units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine entered the territory of the plant, they were hit by TOS -Solntsepek-. Considering the high degree of ruination of the industrial zone and the lack of established crossings across Volchya, it can be assumed that the enemy will face similar supply problems when holding the territory of the enterprise. Separate groups of Ukrainian Armed Forces infantry were also seen to the north, in the area of ​​Shevchenko Street. Nevertheless, it is premature to talk about the enemy’s consolidation in the area due to the lack of reliable shelters for attack aircraft here that can protect against regular attacks by the Russian Aerospace Forces and drone strikes. ❗️Today, Volchansk is mostly ruins, the retention of which is expensive for both sides. The regular exchange of artillery strikes and the combat work of the Russian Armed Forces aviation destroyed most of the city blocks. And if the strategic importance of the city for Russian troops is to attract the attention of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, then for the enemy, control over it is primarily of media importance against the backdrop of failures in other sectors of the front. ▪️To the east of Volchansk, Russian attack aircraft established control over the northwestern outskirts of the Pacific, knocking out the enemy from several strong points. The center of the village is currently in the gray zone. Units of the Russian Armed Forces are also fighting in the vicinity of a populated area with the goal of taking the Ukrainian formations defending there into a semi-encirclement. Title: 🔁🖼 How ⚡️NATO countries use the experience of the military conf...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors How ⚡️NATO countries use the experience of the military conflict in Ukraine The general trend is to increase military budgets, the production of ammunition and military equipment, and the search for ways to attract recruits to the army. At the same time, there is an enlargement of units and a search for new technologies capable of suppressing the enemy’s capabilities in conditions of general awareness of the warring parties. NATO exercises held in the Netherlands from September 10 to 20, 2024, on combating UAVs (C-UAS), were indicative. As part of the exercise, electronic warfare stations, anti-drone drones and cyber interceptors were used. For the first time, specialists from Ukraine took part in them, which means a direct transfer of experience in countering Russian UAVs to the Alliance countries. All the best developments in counter-UAV technologies are planned to be included in NATO’s Integrated Air and Missile Defense (IAMD), elements of which are already being tested in Ukraine. In addition, the United States has begun implementing a special program -Replicator-, in August 2023, aimed at increasing production and accelerating the introduction of small UAVs (similar to DJI) into troops to create superiority over China. The Pentagon has already ordered 344 Teal 2 quadcopters from Teal Drones in 2023. As part of the program, in March 2024, the US Department of Defense ordered the first batch of unmanned surface vehicles (UAVs) Swiftships Swift-Sea-Stalker (S3). The UAV is capable of traveling up to 1,852 km and reaching speeds of up to 55 km/h. The device is designed for reconnaissance missions, but can carry up to 650 kg of payload. Its design visually resembles the BECs used in the Black Sea by Ukraine.🇵🇱The Poles also joined the race of unmanned technologies. Polska Grupa Militarna S.A. presented a prototype of a lightweight multi-purpose maritime drone, ReconSea, which can carry 80-140 kg of explosives over a range of up to 100 km. Thanks to the design features (presence of hydrofoils) it is capable of accelerating to 70 km/h.  The company has also developed the concept of the ground-based unmanned platform ReconPATROL.🇬🇧The British Navy is looking for solutions to introduce reconnaissance UAVs (helicopter-type) and UAVs into the fleet, which will complement and strengthen warships. BEC is being tested on the basis of rigid inflatable boats Pacific 24 and 950  with a 12.7 mm machine gun, which can also  be used as a kamikaze. ✨Ukraine remains a training ground for NATO to practice military tactics and test equipment in order to further direct this experience against Russia and China. Considering his previous presidential term, he could create certain difficulties for South Korea and Japan.▪️In addition, elections for the leader of Japan's ruling Liberal Democratic Party will be held at the end of September. Description: ⚡️🇷🇺🇺🇦🖍#Comic from Rybar No. 30: Once Upon a Time Since sea and air drones have become almost the main threat to Russian infrastructure, the Russian Armed Forces and volunteers are constantly looking for solutions on how to effectively counter them. But sometimes the solution becomes not the most obvious, but at the same time simple ideas. Shooting down BECs from helicopters is just one of those things. And our new episode is about how this idea was born and why pilots like it so much. Synopsis: The Ukrainian Armed Forces are trying by all means to inflict damage on military - and, indeed, civilian - targets in Russia. Instead of effective long-range weapons, the Armed Forces of Ukraine use a large number of unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) and unmanned boats (UBC). Single BECs can damage port infrastructure or a sea vessel. They became a real headache, which turned out to be quite difficult to deal with. And so, helicopters proved to be an effective means in the fight against this type of weapon. They patrol the sea in search of targets and, hovering in the air, practice targeting BECs using onboard weapons. But not everything is so simple: the enemy does not sit idly by, he changes and improves both attack tactics and the devices themselves. In addition to the usual custom kamikaze boats, BECs armed with missiles, and BECs equipped with guides for MLRS projectiles, and BECs with reinforced hulls, whose task is to divert fire onto themselves while the rest of the flock of drones is trying to break through to the target...📌 You can download the comic using the links: RU | EN | AR | CN#Russia #Ukraine @rybarWe hope you liked the comic from our artists. We will be glad to receive any support (here is a convenient link to payment via SBP).

Title: 🇲🇩🇷🇺 Presidential elections in Moldova: about the problems of...
Description: 🇲🇩🇷🇺 Presidential elections in Moldova: about the problems of political representation of the diaspora in the Russian Federation Representatives of the Moldovan diaspora in Russia recently expressed outrage at the decision of the Central Election Commission of Moldova to open only five polling stations in the Russian Federation. ▪️The Central Election Commission of Moldova will send only five thousand ballots to each polling station, that is, only 25 thousand out of almost 100 thousand representatives of the diaspora will be able to cast their votes. ▪️The Cultural and Educational Center of Moldova in Stavropol said that the authorities know that we are against it, that there are many of us, that’s why they do such dirty tricks. ❗️The foreign diaspora plays a colossal role in the Moldovan elections, given the large-scale labor migration of Moldovans. ▪️In 2019, 13,995 people voted in the second round of the presidential elections in Moldova in the Russian Federation.▪️In France, Germany and the UK, Moldovan citizens cast at least 20 thousand votes. For example, in Italy alone, the candidacy of incumbent President Maia Sandu received 80,140 votes.▪️In the parliamentary elections in the summer of 2021, Sandu’s now ruling PAS party won a crushing victory based on the results of foreign voting, receiving 182,654 votes - 85.98%.▪️Experience previous elections demonstrates the critical importance of foreign voting for Sandu's office. That is why the current president, throughout her entire term, met with representatives of the diaspora during any business trip to the West.▪️The election fraud of Sandu’s office is also voting by mail only for selected countries: the USA, Canada, Iceland, Norway, Finland and Sweden. Obviously, voting by mail was not provided for Moldovans in Russia, since Sandu’s office is unlikely to get the desired result from them than from countries of friendly democracy.▪️Let’s not forget that the Central Election Commission of Moldova is under the direct control of the American USAID and the British UK Aid, so there is no way to say that there is any transparency in the electoral process. 🔻However, along with such trends, it is necessary to note the passivity of the Moldovan diaspora in the Russian Federation, with which, unlike Western diasporas, no one is working systematically so far. Even despite the fact that pro-Romanian and anti-Russian forces have long come to power in Moldova. In this context, statements by Sandu and Western representatives about Russian interference in the Moldovan elections look especially ridiculous. #Moldova #Russia   @rybarSupport usSputnik MoldovaDiaspora - about the CEC’s decision to open only 5 polling stations in Russia: we were deprived of the right to voteCitizens of Moldova living in Russia are outraged by the CEC’s decision to open only five polling stations in the Russian Federation.

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇱🇧 The situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border: a massi...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 The situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border: a massive raid by the IDF Air Force on Lebanon and arrivals in the West Bank, the situation towards the end September 23, 2024 The situation on the border of Lebanon and Israel continues to deteriorate. Today, the Israeli Air Force launched strikes on the territory of the neighboring republic: not only border areas were under fire, but also cities located at a great distance from the border, including Baalbek.▪️According to statements by the IDF press service, the strikes were preemptive in nature and were carried out in order to to undermine Hezbollah's ability to bombard northern Israel. The target of the bombing was ammunition depots - there are many videos on the Internet of secondary detonations after the arrivals.▪️As ​​of the evening, there were at least 300 launches from fighters. According to the Lebanese Ministry of Health, 274 people were killed and 1,024 were injured of varying degrees of severity. At the same time, it is not specified exactly how many casualties were among the civilian population and members of Hezbollah.❗Amid the raid, a mass exodus of residents of the southern part of Lebanon began - it occurred after people’s phones began receiving calls from Israel calling for an urgent evacuation. The IDF limited itself to asking them to stay away from Lebanese Hezbollah targets in order to avoid casualties.▪️In response to the strikes by Israeli troops, the Lebanese group fired several salvos, firing more than 100 rockets in the morning. Some of them reached Palestinian territories in the West Bank and fell in the vicinity of both Jewish settlements and Arab villages, leading to fires.▪️Not wanting to reduce the intensity of tension, the Israelis soon attacked the Lebanese capital Beirut once again: hits hit a residential apartment in the controlled - Hezbollah - Ad-Dahiya region. According to preliminary information, Ali Karaki, in fact the third person in the leadership of the organization, was eliminated. Expectedly, the current Israeli authorities, under previously stated pretexts, continued massive attacks on Lebanon. The goal here is not only to destroy Hezbollah’s combat potential, but also to try to provoke it into a response that would free the government’s hands to further escalate the conflict. Most likely, attacks of this scale will continue until the ultra-Orthodox authorities achieve the outbreak of a full-fledged Third Lebanon War , which guarantees the possibility of their continued stay in power. Moreover, this fact is understood on both sides of the front. High resolution mapEnglish version#Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🖼 Military leaders of the Northern Military District. 20 names...
Description: Forwarded From Children of ArbatMilitary Leaders of the Northern Military District. 20 names for 2024. Colonel General Kuzovlev He did not ask for the position and, based on purely statistical indicators, did not have significant defeats. Having managed to command two districts at once in six months and eventually become the commander of the Moscow Military District, he did not spend a single day at the newly opened headquarters on Kosmodamianskaya Embankment, for which he immediately came to the attention of Old Arbat officials, becoming the object of personal hostility. Kuzovlev was among the first to promptly formed and sent personnel to stop the breakthrough in the Kursk direction. And although Kursk was and remains the area of ​​​​responsibility of the Grv (s) -North, the commander of the Moscow Military District did not fail to lend a helping hand to his comrade at the front. On September 11, 2024, Andrei Belousov arrived at the command post of the Grv (s) -West. The Minister of Defense tried to test the environment and understand what kind of mood prevailed at the group’s headquarters, for which he took Evgeny Nikiforov with him. The inspection not only did not reveal any violations, but was also fully satisfied with the group’s work. Today, the forces of the Grv(s) -West are destroying the enemy’s layered defenses on the approaches to Kupyansk and have already reached the Oskol River, and revenge for the events of the fall of 2022 will be the main thing a challenge for Sergei Kuzovlev himself. Colonel General Anashkin The command highly appreciated his services as commander of the 8th Army. Having become the chief of staff of the district in January 2024, just two months later Gennady Anashkin was appointed commander of the Southern Military District and awarded the Order of Merit for the Fatherland, 2nd class with swords. The South group of troops today has significantly increased its forces: back in July, enemy sources wrote on the accumulation of reserves in the Zaporozhye direction. Throughout the year, Anashkin has been increasing the combat and numerical strength of the district’s artillery brigades using cannon artillery, largely thanks to friendly relations with his neighbor in the operational direction and concurrently the deputy commander of the OGV (s) Mikhail Teplinsky. Despite the ongoing positional battles in the direction, the command of the OGV ( c) believes that it is the South group that will have to win the strategic initiative in 2025, but Anashkin himself strives not to appear in the information field and does not use hardware resources for PR campaigns, believing that a good commander is an inconspicuous commander. Title: 🇺🇸 On the prospects of a shutdown in the US on the eve of the U...
Description: 🇺🇸 On the prospects of a shutdown in the US ahead of the elections, the US Congress is once again faced with the possibility of temporarily suspending the work of the federal government on September 30. The main disagreements between the parties, as before, relate to budget priorities, especially regarding funding for defense and social programs. Republicans, especially in the House of Representatives, are pushing for spending cuts and want to keep funding at 2024 levels. Democrats, in turn, support increasing them through 2025 to fulfill promises to improve social and defense programs. House Speaker Mike Johnson until recently pushed for a GOP-friendly stopgap spending bill that would fund the federal government for another six months. The bill meant maintaining spending at 2024 levels without increasing funding for some programs. 🔻In addition, it contained one very important point proposed by Donald Trump - a bill (SAVE Act) requiring proof of citizenship for voter registration in elections. In this way, the former president hoped to thwart the Democrats' plan to win the election by attracting thousands of illegal migrants to vote for Kamala Harris. However, on September 19, Johnson suffered a major setback: 14 Republicans, joining almost all Democrats, voted against the proposed bill. Conservatives felt that the act did not include sufficient measures to cut costs, hawks were concerned about the possibility of undermining the US defense potential, and moderates were worried about the threat of a shutdown too close to the elections. As a result, on September 23, Mike Johnson broke down under the pressure of his fellow party members and Democrats and agreed to the so-called -Plan B-. It provides for the approval of a spending bill that extends the government until December 20 of this year, and also excludes the SAVE Act promoted by Trump. Despite the fact that Johnson, during negotiations with Trump, managed to convince him that the shutdown would have a much worse impact on the president's position in the election rather than repealing the SAVE Act, the consequences of the failure of Johnson's original plan are obvious. The absence of a law requiring citizenship to register voters in elections will allow Kamala Harris and Co. to attract hundreds of thousands of illegal migrants to vote for themselves.#USA@rybar in collaboration with @usaperiodicalSupport usTelegramAmerican number⚫️ Yes, yes: Speaker of the House of Representatives, Republican Mike Johnson, broke under the pressure his fellow party members and Democrats and agreed to the so-called Plan B. Title: 🇷🇺🇰🇿 About the project of the International Organization for ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇰🇿 About the project of the International Organization for the Russian Language Against the background of Turkey’s active actions to promote a single Turkic alphabet in Central Asia, many wondered: is there really no alternative on our part? Well, formally there is, and Maria Zakharova reminded about it during the briefing on the sidelines of the 15th Eurasian Women's Forum in St. Petersburg on September 20. 📌We are talking about the creation of an International Organization for the Russian Language, a decision about which was made about a year ago by the leaders of the CIS at a meeting in Bishkek. Zakharova was quite optimistic about the prospects for this organization to quickly formalize and begin work, and became in fact the first major Russian official to remember the project this year. According to the plan voiced by the President of Kazakhstan Tokayev, the organization was supposed to become almost the second Fracophonie or at least the Commonwealth Portuguese-speaking countries, but in fact it has become an opportunity for Kazakhstan to reject accusations of de-Russification of the country and so far serves only this thesis. At the same time, we will not agree with the optimism of our Foreign Ministry regarding the prospects of the organization. According to our information, the procedure for the official ratification of this agreement by at least three CIS states that signed it has not been completed, which is necessary to launch organizational procedures and hold the long-awaited ministerial conference, which should launch the process of actually creating the organization. Moreover, the only activity of responsible structures in this direction is the internal struggle for the post of formal leader (secretary, coordinator, etc.) of this organization, as well as the determination of Sochi (and not St. Petersburg, as Tokayev proposed) as the location of the Secretariat. If the promotion of the Russian language will be carried out at the same pace and with the same enthusiasm, then indeed Central Asia will soon speak Turkish. #Kazakhstan #Russia #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usTACCIt was decided to establish an international organization for the Russian language following the results of the CIS summit; the initiative to establish such a structure was taken by the President of Kazakhstan Kassym-Jomart Tokayev

Title: 🔁 Additional information has appeared on the topic of British sp...
Description: Forwarded From Balkan Gossip Girl On the topic of British spies expelled from Russia, additional information has appeared about dubious contacts of MI6 with local Muslims. For example, one of the grandiose failures of Foggy Albion is associated with Macedonia. There, back in 1995, with funds from humanitarian - educational - funds from Great Britain, they tried to launch the first - independent - university in the Albanian language. It is from here that the resistance movement, dreaming of a Greater Albania, will subsequently spread across the Balkans. Because they were not presented as citizens of Macedonia or, at worst, Albania, but as infiltrators from Great Britain and the USA. Journalist Scott Taylor then added fuel to the fire, who managed to take the lion's share of the footage out of the country and publish it. Under the cover of Britain, networks for disseminating democratic Islam were already operating at that time, and one of them was gathering Muslim spiritual leaders, preachers, imams and heads of large religious communities. Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: fighting along the entire length of the front the situation towards the end September 22, 2024 Fierce fighting continues in the Kursk direction. In addition to repelling attacks and their own attacks, the Russian Armed Forces also strike at enemy rear areas in the Sumy region. In Shaposhnikovo, an Iskander OTRK strike hit a HIMARS MLRS position and an ammunition depot. In addition, energy and other facilities in the regional center are regularly hit. In the Glushkovsky district, the enemy continues to try to reach the regional center from the Novy Put and Medvezhiy. There are reports that sappers of the Ukrainian Armed Forces are making passages in minefields to continue the offensive. Footage continues to appear on the Internet, clarifying the scale of the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ attacks—the enemy has brought a large number of personnel and armored vehicles, including foreign-made ones, to the region. In particular, another Leopard 2A6 was destroyed southeast of Vesely.🔻In the Korenevsky district, the Russian aviation group carried out drone strikes on the positions and equipment of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Olgovka and in the forest area near Kremyany. In the indicated area, an attempt at a counterattack by the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the western part of Lyubimovka was also thwarted. In the area of ​​Zeleny Shlyakh, a UAV strike destroyed a 2S3 self-propelled gun - Akatsiya - of the Ukrainian formations. The fact that the enemy is bringing more and more armored vehicles and artillery into the territory of the Russian Federation indicates very serious intentions to stay as long as possible in the occupied part of the Kursk region. 🔻In the Sudzhansky district, fighting continues in the Darino and Nikolaevo-Daryino areas, complete control over which will open the way to an offensive in the direction of Sverdlikovo. Title: 🔁🖼 ⚡️There are signs of preparation for an escalation in Transn...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors⚡️There are signs of preparation for an escalation in Transnistria🇺🇸The United States has approved the sale to Romania of 44 AAV-7 tracked amphibious landing vehicles for $210 million, which will be supplied from the reserves of the US Marine Corps. The vehicle is the primary vehicle of the 4th Assault Amphibious Battalion (4th AABn) of the US Marine Corps Reserve, highlighting the sensitivity of amphibious sales. The AAV-7 is designed to conduct amphibious operations in the coastal zone. One vehicle can accommodate up to 25 military personnel and 3 crew members. Still, 44 vehicles will make it possible to move 1,100 military personnel (in fact, two full-blooded battalions) across water obstacles at a distance of up to 37 km. This water reserve is not enough to sail to the Crimean coast (and Romania will not be able to deliver amphibians by landing ship due to their lack of service), but it will be enough to quickly transfer forward detachments to Transnistria across the Dniester River. Romania, surrounded by its NATO ⚡️ neighbors and Ukraine, is unlikely to need to cross rivers with its allies. At the same time, under the leadership of NATO, the increased militarization 🇲🇩 of Moldova continues. Most Moldovan military exercises this year took place with the participation of Romanian and American troops. Specialists from these countries have developed a project and are supervising the construction of a new military base, training ground and ammunition depot in the village of Bachoi, 25 km from the PMR. Alliance standards are being implemented everywhere in the Moldavian Armed Forces, officers, especially young ones, are being trained according to NATO programs. 🇫🇷France, 🇩🇪Germany and 🇺🇸The United States have increased military-technical assistance in hopes of strengthening the potential of the Moldavian army.✨Such actions in the future will create a serious threat to the Operational Group of Russian troops in the Transnistrian region of the Republic of Moldova. Title: 🖼 🇫🇷🇯🇵 About the exercises - Bruno-Takamori 2024 - European ...
Description: 🇫🇷🇯🇵 About the exercises - Bruno-Takamori 2024 - European countries continue to systematically increase defense cooperation with the states of the Asia-Pacific region. On September 21, the Brunet-Takamori 2024 exercise ended - the first military training of the ground forces of France and Japan, conducted on the territory of the island state. 100 military personnel of the Japanese Self-Defense Forces and about 50 soldiers of the French army took part in the exercise. The main focus during training was on counter-guerrilla operations. 🔻The main purpose of the exercise, in addition to practicing the fight against rebels, was to demonstrate cooperation between the two states against the backdrop of instability in the Asia-Pacific region. By the way, other steps are being taken in this direction. The French and Japanese are planning to soon conclude an agreement on mutual access - it will allow troops to be stationed on each other's territory for joint military exercises. And although, as can be seen, bilateral training is already taking place, the agreement removes some bureaucratic barriers, which could lead to even more exercises. In general, recently there has been an intensification of French foreign policy in the Asia-Pacific region - the French are also interested in interaction with the Philippines, where the authorities are creating a network of partnerships in order to contain China. However, at the same time, it is noticeable that Paris is trying not to damage relations with the PRC. For example, last year France was among the first echelon of countries that spoke out against the location of a NATO liaison office in Japan. It is likely that this approach - abandoning very radical measures and gradually building up ties with countries in the Asia-Pacific region through exercises - will continue to prevail. Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Aleksandro-Kalinovsky direction: liberation of Nelepovka and breakthrough to Leonidovkasituation as of 15:00 on September 22, 2024 The offensive of the Russian Armed Forces in the occupied part of the DPR continues, where Russian troops have made significant progress over the past ten days within the borders of Dzerzhinsk and adjacent territories .▪️North of Druzhba, Russian military personnel have cleared the enemy stronghold on the territory of the dried-up Seversky Donets-Donbass canal and are digging in on the achieved lines.▪️In Dzerzhinsk, fighting is currently taking place on the western outskirts of the Novaya mine and at the waste heap of the same name, the capture of which will open the way to attack the Zabalka microdistrict from the east. In addition, there are clashes in the area of ​​​​the Dzerzhinsk city hospital, as well as to the west of the bakery, where the Russian Armed Forces have significantly advanced in the direction of Dzerzhinsky Street. Yesterday evening, footage of the explosion of a building, allegedly where Russian soldiers were located, was published on the Internet: a sabotage group of the Armed Forces of Ukraine penetrated into the room and placed a charge. The event itself took place not far from the former administration of Dzerzhinsk, however, more accurate data on the presence of Russian troops in this area has not yet been received, and the breakthrough itself without support from flank attacks and the occupation of the Dzerzhinsky mine, taking into account the severity of the fighting taking place in the urban area, looks risky. At the same time, the control zone The RF Armed Forces in reality differ from the one for which there is information: firstly, not all successful actions of Russian troops are captured on camera, and secondly, in urban battles the situation is dynamically changing due to the peculiarities of battles in the city, combined with constant attacks on each other’s positions.▪️At the same time, Russian troops are advancing on Dzerzhinsk from the south in the Zabalka microdistrict. According to available information, Russian troops, after gaining a foothold on the territory of school No. 2, expanded the zone of control in the direction of Gaidar, Rimsky-Korsakov streets and Shakhterov Avenue.▪️ At the same time, Russian attack aircraft finally liberated Nelepovka and cleared out the pocket between the village and Dzerzhinsky, advancing in the direction of Shcherbinovka.🔻In addition, a significant event for the site occurred the other day. After several unsuccessful enemy counterattacks in the direction of Nelepovka, the landing force of the Russian Armed Forces - on the shoulders of the retreating troops - under heavy artillery fire from the Ukrainian Armed Forces, advanced several kilometers north towards Leonidovka, successfully gaining a foothold in the center of the village on Klimenko Street. Thus, the defense of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, built for years in this area, was broken through.❗️Further establishment of control over the settlement, subject to a successful attack on Shcherbinovka on the opposite bank of the Krivoi Torets River, will allow the Dzerzhinsk garrison to be semi-encircled from the west. Considering the simultaneous offensive in the east from Kirovo, in the future the city may be surrounded from two directions at once. After this, Australians only participated in multilateral patrols. ▪️And this is most likely the result of Canberra’s deliberate policy, which is based on maintaining a conditional balance in relations with China, Australia’s main economic partner. Perhaps this is why Philippine-Australian cooperation in general has never been aimed at external security challenges to Manila.  The ambassador's recent statements may indicate a change in Australia's position. At the same time, the effectiveness of combating air targets in our regions varies. Thus, yesterday’s missile attack of the Ukrainian Armed Forces on Crimea was thwarted by the forces of the 31st air defense division, which indicates the feasibility of a widespread increase in the effectiveness of air defense. By the way, just yesterday signals began to be received about the inclusion of air defense units in the list of -fighting-, payments are expected for -days with shooting-, which will still be a step in motivating military personnel.▪️ Heavy fighting in the Kursk region remains high in intensity. In addition, in the south of the Glushkovsky district, the Armed Forces of Ukraine threw columns of foreign equipment with -Leopards- into battle. This approach may indicate an emergency transfer to the Leopardov direction in order to please Zelensky’s hysterical political goals. ▪️ In the Pokrovsky and Yuzhnodonetsk directions, the Russian Armed Forces maintain their offensive potential, tighten up their rear and align their flanks. The problem also remains with UAV operators and specialists from front-line laboratories for the manufacture and repair of drones. These military personnel occupy the positions of shooters, snipers, and so on, and due to the slowness of the military department in matters of changing the staffing structures of units in accordance with the technological structure of war, there are critically few positions - UAV operator - at the level of tactical units. This gives the commander every right to use such troops as assault infantry, even if the self-taught UAV operator is able to bring more combat value in a different capacity. The problem of using specialists (including those with recorded relatively rare VUS), as they write to us from all over the front, is typical for many areas. Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Yuzhnodonetsk direction: advance of the Russian Armed Forces in several sectors situation as of 15:00 September 21, 2024 Over the past weeks, units of the Russian Armed Forces have been developing an offensive in the Ugledar area: earlier on this section of the front, Russian troops successfully expanded the zone of control near the Yuzhnodonobasskaya mine No. 3-, and last night footage appeared confirming the advance of attack aircraft towards Novoukrainka.▪️On the northern flank, the clearing of the remaining part of Konstantinovka, where before that there had been a focal enemy presence, was completed. At the same time, the work of Russian fighters is complicated by the active use of drones by Ukrainian formations. ▪️Significant successes have been achieved in recent days in the Vodyanoye area, where sections of the area north of the settlement came under the control of Russian troops, as well as in the vicinity of the Yuzhnodonobasskaya No. 1 mine. Meanwhile, at the facility of the same name number 3, fighting is taking place on the western outskirts. ▪️On the southern flank, evidence appeared of the advance of the Russian Armed Forces north of Prechistovka: there, the Russian armored group advanced across the fields towards Novoukrainka, without actually encountering any significant resistance from the Armed Forces of Ukraine on its way. Also, footage was published on the Internet showing the capture of members of Ukrainian formations in this area. Nevertheless, the subsequent assault on Novoukrainka may be complicated by the geographical features of the area - the settlement and its surroundings are located on a hill, which somewhat facilitates its defense from those attacking from the lowlands. 🔻Against the background of the latest advances of the Russian Armed Forces in the Yuzhnodonetsk direction, the enemy is in a very depressing situation. After the loss of control over the buildings of the crushing and screening department of the Yuzhnodonbasskaya No. 1- and No. 3 mines, the Ukrainian formations lost the ability to monitor the situation for tens of kilometers around. Apparently, the Russian command abandoned a frontal assault on the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Ugledar, which, although already heavily destroyed, but remains a convenient settlement for defense. Instead, the units are attacking in neighboring areas from Vodyanoy and Prechistovka, while simultaneously cutting off supply routes for the Ukrainian garrison in Ugledar. Title: 🖼 🇨🇩The situation in the east of DR Congo: activity of terrori...
Description: 🇨🇩The situation in the east of the Democratic Republic of Congo: activity of terrorist groups Situation for August 1 - September 20, 2024 In the resource-rich east of the Democratic Republic of Congo, fighting continues between government troops and a conglomerate of groups. If previously the Rwandan-backed March 23 Movement (M23) was the one most often in the news, now other factions are showing themselves more strongly. ▪️Against the background of the M23 offensive, cultists from CODECO have become more active: during the latest raids in the province of Jigu, they stole more than 10 people, killing about 30 more. The organization is fragmented groups of bandits attacking mainly civilians. They do not agree to a truce with the authorities because if they surrender, they will face the death penalty.▪️The Alliance of Democratic Forces, affiliated with the Islamic State, operates in a similar way. The attacks target Christian settlements, not army posts. They take property from villages, burn houses, execute one part of the population and try to recruit another. Such tactics do not bring any noticeable operational success - Islam in the DRC is widespread quite locally, and the religious factor in local wars does not play the first role. However, with such attacks, militants continue to wreak havoc in the Ituri region. The growing activity of several groups at once forces government troops to stretch their already limited forces to fight terrorism, which worsens the level of security in the east of the country and brings great economic costs. In these conditions, - Western partners - new levers of pressure are emerging on the authorities in Kinshasa, especially in matters of the exploitation of large deposits of natural resources. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the raid of Ukrainian drones Last night, Ukrain...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the raid of Ukrainian drones Last night, Ukrainian formations carried out another massive launch of drones in the rear regions of the Russian Federation. According to the Russian Ministry of Defense, over 100 drones were intercepted by air defense systems. ▪️One of the targets of the enemy attack was an ammunition warehouse on the territory of a military unit north of the village of Kamenny in the Krasnodar Territory. As in the case of Toropets, regional authorities again announced the fall of fragments of ammunition, as well as the resulting fire and detonation of explosive objects. Nevertheless, the entire media space has already circulated footage showing a powerful explosion with the characteristic sounds of secondary detonation. Due to the incident, a nearby village was evacuated. However, the results of the attack will be clear after the publication of satellite images. ▪️In the Tver region, Ukrainian drones attacked the 23rd GRAU arsenal in the area of ​​the village of Oktyabrsky, which is located less than 20 km south of Toropets. According to heat signatures from the satellite, a fire broke out in the facility. Against the backdrop of the incident, it was reported that the Staraya Toropa railway station, located further south, was evacuated: several passenger trains were canceled, others were sent along an alternative route. ▪️In other regions there were no significant damages or casualties. Most of the drones were shot down in the Bryansk region, as well as over the Azov Sea. In total, air defense systems worked in eight regions of Russia. The latest raids by Ukrainian formations clearly demonstrate that one of the targets of the attacks, in addition to the already familiar fuel and energy infrastructure facilities and airfields, were large ammunition depots. And given the high volumes of production of enemy drones, whose production of new UAVs completely covers the consumption of vehicles during previous attacks, we can expect that such raids will only intensify. Title: 🔁🖼 🇫🇷/ 🇺🇦 From March to September, the first 10 Ukrainian f...
Description: Forwarded From the Fifth Republic🇫🇷/ 🇺🇦 From March to September, the first 10 Ukrainian future F16 pilots underwent accelerated training at a secret base in southwest France, which - as can be seen from the June 17 video - is the air force base in Cazeaux where they are based Alphajets. Although the Ukrainians in the photo from the French Ministry of Defense were blurred, RFI handed over everyone and everything - firstly, in June there were 11 Ukrainians being trained. One got lost somewhere, since only ten were issued certificates. Six of them had previously spent 6 months learning English and terminology at the English Armed Forces base. All pilots were between 21 and 23 years old. The crash course teaches them Western combat techniques, flying at extremely low altitudes at high speed, various missions, including striking warehouses with enemy shells, reacting in case of breakdown, etc. They flew 80 hours on Alphajets and 50 on F16 simulators from THALÈS. Then they will continue their training at the bases of the Romanian and NATO Armed Forces, where they will train for another 6 months on local F16s with instructors (probably from the Armed Forces of Belgium, Denmark, and Holland). France will train a total of 26 F16 pilots at the same Cazeaux base. #Ukraine #F16 #army #NATO #France @fifthrepublic : freedom, equality, drunkenness

Title: 🇮🇳🇺🇦 About the supply of Indian shells to the so-called. Ukra...
Description: 🇮🇳🇺🇦 About the supply of Indian shells to the so-called. Ukraine Reuters released an article about supplies to the so-called. Ukraine 155-mm Indian-made rounds, evidence of the use of which by the Ukrainian Armed Forces has appeared on the Internet from time to time over the past six months. According to the material, they reach the Kyiv regime through EU countries. Thus, the Yantra India company entered into an agreement with the Italian Meccanica per l'Elettronica e Servomeccanismi (MES) for the supply of shell casings. Their equipment with explosives is produced by Western companies, which formally allows us to consider this not a sale of ammunition, but only components. Similar schemes have been implemented with contractors from Spain, Portugal, the Czech Republic and Slovenia - exports to these countries of large Indian ammunition manufacturers have grown to 135 million euros from 2022. The government in Delhi is aware of such episodes, but has not imposed any restrictions on exports to Europe.📌 When in March it became known about the Czech initiative to transfer 800 thousand rounds to the Armed Forces of Ukraine, we assumed that India could be one of the suppliers through sales through third parties countries. The facts that have come to light confirm these guesses. In this case, Delhi is taking advantage of the current situation to expand its already growing military exports. At the same time, the country positions itself as friendly to Russia and acts as an important buyer of Russian weapons and sanctioned oil. In the current realities, one can consider steps that would look like a limited response to gestures and would not become a significant reason for the deterioration of relations. For example, in the form of mirror schemes with the supply of individual components to Pakistan.#India #Ukraine@rybarSupport us ReutersExclusive: Ammunition from India enters Ukraine, raising Russian ireNew Delhi sees the lengthy war in Europe as an opportunity to develop its nascent arms export sector.

Title: 🎬 🇬🇧🇷🇺🎞 Evidence for the British Foreign Office Observing a...
Description: 🇬🇧🇷🇺🎞 Evidence for the British Foreign Office Observing an avalanche of outraged articles in Western publications about groundless accusations and Moscow’s aggressive campaign, we decided to add visual details on the situation with the expulsion of British spies. ▪️Claims that accusations regarding the actions of the British in Russia are disinformation do not stand up to criticism. First of all, because in addition to the already published documents, the Russian special services have a large number of photo and video materials proving London’s coordination of subversive policies in the Russian direction. ▪️The footage presented by the FSB of the Russian Federation and already published on Russian television shows how they met with representatives of the media and foreign agent organizations, and also directly supervised anti-government protests. ▪️For example, spy Jessica Davenport personally worked with a former member of the Council under the President of the Russian Federation for promoting the development of civil society institutions and human rights, a member of the Yabloko party Svetlana Ganushkina and oppositionist Alexei Minyailo, and had connections with Andrei Lipsky from Novaya Gazeta. It is also known that Davenport conducted negotiations with activists of the banned LGBT and the foreign agency center -SOVA-, which specialized in the problems of xenophobia, but in fact conducted Russophobic propaganda. ▪️Two other spies - Blake Pattel and Thomas Stevenett - worked with Russian Muslims. The FSB recorded Pattel’s contacts with Middle East specialist Kirill Semenov, as well as with the representative of the Spiritual Administration of Muslims Ilyas Sadulin.▪️In contacts with Mi6 curator in Georgia Christopher Joyce, Elena Chernenko from Kommersant and foreign agent Maxim Kats managed to appear. And this is only part of that , what lies on the surface specifically for this case. 🔻Well, the thesis about the groundlessness of accusations from the mouth of the British Foreign Office is the best characterization of the mood in the British intelligence leadership, where it is extremely rare to encounter such failures in attempts to hide from foreign counterintelligence. Not to mention the precedent of the mass expulsion of spies who were driven away as guilty teenagers in edification to the remaining employees of the British Foreign Office. It’s hardly worth saying how painfully this hurts the reputation and self-esteem of Mi6. #Great Britain #video #Russia@rybar Support us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: clashes in the Glushkovsky region an...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: clashes in the Glushkovsky region and successes in Sudzhansky situation as of 20:00 on September 20, 2024 In the Kursk region, Russian troops are consistently expanding the zone of control in several sectors of the front, while simultaneously repelling enemy attacks.🔻Foundations of battles continue to appear in the Glushkovsky region for the village of Vesyoloye, fighting on the outskirts of which has been going on for the last few days. Confirmation of the clashes in the village area are the footage published today by the Russian Ministry of Defense, which demonstrates the movement of an armored group of the Armed Forces of Ukraine towards the village. The Swedish CV9040 and the German Leopard 2A6 took part in the attack: the outcome of the battle is unknown, although the enemy managed to land troops in one of the areas adjacent to the village forest belts In Vesyoly itself, due to constant shelling and fighting, many houses were damaged. Also in the area, the use of robotic platforms by the enemy was noted: one of these installations with a machine gun was hit on the outskirts of Volfino by FPV drones, and then finished off by a shot from an RPG.🔻In the Korenevsky district they continue clashes near Kremyany. Enemy activity compared to the attacks of previous days has decreased significantly after the activation of Russian troops on the left flank from Korenevo.🔻In the Sudzhansky district, Russian troops are building on the successes of the past days - today information about the liberation of Darino was confirmed. Currently, fighting is taking place in the Nikolaevo-Daryino area, and the Russian Armed Forces managed to enter and gain a foothold in Uspenovka. In addition, four conscripts who occupied positions in the forest for almost 40 days, transmitting data on the enemy’s movements and carrying out other activities, were removed from encirclement .🔻In the Bolshesoldatsky district, the Ukrainian Armed Forces fired at a gas distribution station in the administrative center and other civilian infrastructure in adjacent villages. In total, over ten residential buildings were damaged, and in Rzhava, a shell from a hexacopter destroyed the local House of Culture. Title: 🎬🖼 🇮🇱🇱🇧 About the Israeli Air Force strike on the Lebanese ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 About the Israeli Air Force strike on the Lebanese capital Israeli aircraft launched a new attack on Beirut, launching missiles at the southern suburb of the Lebanese capital - the Ad-Dahiya district. The hit was on a building not far from the large Al-Qaem mosque. In Arabic-language media, this area is presented as a kind of Hezbollah patrimony, since several buildings belonging to it are located there, including the department of law enforcement agencies. It is noteworthy that it was there that the chief of staff of the Lebanese group, Fuad Shukri, was killed in July. According to some reports, the building where a meeting of high-ranking Palestinians was taking place with one of the prominent members of the Lebanese group was attacked. At the same time, it is completely unknown who exactly represented Hezbollah: according to one information, the group’s deputy secretary general Naim Qassem, according to another, the head of the operational department Ibrahim Aqil. However, a much larger number of sources agree that it was the latter who was the target of the Israeli attack. The second recent loss of a commander of this level will be quite significant for Hezbollah, given the events of recent days. 📌 Be that as it may, over the past months, Israeli troops have been increasing the degree of tension more and more each time in order to provoke the Lebanese group into more decisive actions and finally unleash a full-scale war. A few days ago, the Israelis carried out a massive remote detonation of Hezbollah pagers, after which they carried out a massive shelling of the border and rear settlements of Lebanon, and today they carried out an attack on one of the prominent members of the group. Apparently, all this will continue until a clear reaction is received from the Lebanese movement. And then the Israelis will blame Iran for starting the war with Hezbollah, presenting themselves as the defending side. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Liman direction: liberation of Makeyevka, current sit...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Liman direction: liberation of Makeyevkasituation as of 17:00 September 20, 2024 In recent days, the focus of the audience’s attention, in addition to events in the Kursk region and on the fronts of the DPR, has again turned to the Liman direction - there units of the Russian Armed Forces managed to liberate Makeyevka and advance in the area of ​​the Zhuravka gully. ▪️A new round of battles for Makeyevka began about three months ago, but Russian fighters achieved their first significant successes in August, when most of the settlement on the left bank of the Zherebets River came under the control of the Russian Armed Forces. After this, messages appeared sporadically on the Internet about attempts to force the water barrier and gain a foothold in the remaining part of the village. However, only yesterday did footage of objective control by the enemy appear, confirming the presence of Russian Armed Forces fighters there. In particular, Russian units were seen in the area of ​​the Church of Peter and Paul, as well as to the north of it. At the same time, they were able to advance on the southern outskirts, which is also confirmed by filming from Ukrainian drones. The liberation of the settlement is important for the subsequent liquidation of the bridgehead of Ukrainian formations on the right bank of the Zherebets River, which has existed since the fall of 2022. From here it will be possible to increase pressure on the defensive lines of the Ukrainian Armed Forces on the Nevskoye-Yampolovka line. ▪️The advancement of units of the Russian Armed Forces was also recorded to the south - in the area of ​​\u200b\u200bthe Zhuravka gully. Last year, the enemy erected fortifications in this area: they helped to hold back the onslaught towards the villages of Nevskoye and Terny from the east, however, against the backdrop of the liberation of Makeyevka, Russian troops will be able to attack from the north. In other sections of the Liman direction, the configuration of the front has not undergone significant changes - Positional battles are taking place on the ledge near Torskoye and in Serebryansky forestry. Russian troops are striking at identified targets in the front-line and rear zones - one of the targets hit in recent days has been the temporary deployment point of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Liman. Description: Rybar: 🇬🇪🇺🇸 About new US sanctions against Georgia Against the background of the recent adoption by the Georgian parliament of a law banning LGBT propaganda and gender reassignment, Washington announced the introduction of new restrictions against several politicians and media workers: ▪️Head of the Department of the Ministry of Internal Affairs... 🇬🇪 About the elections in Georgia: plans of the ruling party If we talk about the plans of the Georgian authorities after the parliamentary elections in October, then they were outlined by Prime Minister Irakli Kobakhidze and other officials of the ruling party, such as promises - the Nuremberg trials - for Saakashvili's party - the United National Movement -. The goal is to significantly reduce the possibilities of a radically pro-Western opposition and globalist structures. Several clearly expressed information lines can be traced in pro-government media and media resources: ▪️Presentation of the opposition as agents of Western influence and a destructive force intended only to destabilize the country. In particular, Parliament Speaker Shalva Papuashvili called her worthless and stated that the election campaign for Saakashvili’s movement was being built from the outside, including through sanctions against Georgia.▪️The use of opposition slogans against itself, especially dissatisfaction with the ban on LGBT propaganda. From a political technology point of view, this makes it possible to create a stable association among the predominantly conservative population with the fact that the forces opposing the ruling party consist entirely of grant eaters and supporters of -rainbow madness-.▪️Use of narrative -correction of Saakashvili’s mistakes- and preventing forces affiliated with him from returning to power . As part of this, loud and sometimes populist statements follow, such as words about the readiness to apologize to the Ossetians for the war of 08.08.08. As mentioned earlier, the actions of the ruling party in Georgia are determined by the desire to avoid getting the country involved in a new war against Russia. This is exactly what the radically pro-Western opposition is openly striving for, making it almost an element of its election program. In this case, Tbilisi is guided by pragmatic considerations - the country has greatly benefited from trade and economic ties with Russia. At the same time, they also do not seek to sever relations with the collective West for the same reasons. Therefore, the ruling Georgian authorities are striving to eliminate the internal reasons that prevent them from pursuing a balanced policy. Especially against the backdrop of gradually increasing external pressure.#Georgia @rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇬🇪🇷🇺🇺🇸 Ahead of the parliamentary elections in Georgia scheduled for October, Prime Minister Irakli Kobakhidze said that they would be held against the backdrop of unprecedented external interference. Title: 🖇🇷🇺 In Ufa, on September 18, the first court hearing took plac...
Description: 🖇🇷🇺 In Ufa, on September 18, the first court hearing took place in the case of discrediting the RF Armed Forces by the niece of the first president of Bashkortostan, Raufa Rakhimova. Law enforcement officers came to the conclusion that on social networks she forms a negative perception of the SVO and the position that residents of the republic refuse to participate in it. Previously, its publication -Prufy.rf- had already published fakes about Russian military personnel. However, the hearing was eventually postponed to October 4, as the defense attorney filed a motion to postpone it. It is logical: everyone knows that Rakhimova cannot take part in the trial, since on the eve of the trial she fled to Turkey. True, if she does not appear at the trial even then, the judge may well force her to attend - by issuing a ruling on the forced delivery of the defendant.▪️By the way, Rakhimova has already deleted her pages on social networks, on which negative materials regarding the Russian army were published. ▪️She is defended by lawyer Sergei Makarenko, who was also previously convicted under an article on discrediting the RF Armed Forces. Immediately after the start of the SVO, he publicly demonstrated anti-war paraphernalia and expressed a negative attitude towards the special operation, including to law enforcement officers. Before this, Makarenko represented the interests of another oppositionist from Bashkiria, Liliya Chanysheva (foreign agent). She was the head of Navalny’s extremist headquarters in Ufa, the director of the NGO FZPG -Headquarters, through which FBK (an extremist organization) carried out money laundering. Even earlier, Makarenko acted as a lawyer for the son of the first president of Bashkortostan, Ural Rakhimov, accused of economic crimes. All three of Makarenko’s clients are united by the fact that as a result they are abroad. Ural Rakhimov fled to Austria, after which he was put on the international wanted list. Liliya Chanysheva, who was serving a sentence for creating an extremist community in Russia, was traded by the West during a large prisoner exchange. And now the owner of the publication -Prufa.rf - Raufa Rakhimova, who promised the imminent collapse of -Russian authoritarianism-, has fled abroad. #Russia #extremists@rybar together with @arslan_nigaSupport usTelegramRybar🇷🇺🖇 How does the niece of the first president of Bashkortostan, Rauf Rakhimov, support local separatists? Title: 🖼 ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 About Western missiles in the Ukrainian Armed Force...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 About Western missiles in the Ukrainian Armed Forces and possible permission to use them For several weeks now, there have been discussions in the Western and Ukrainian information field about the need to allow the Ukrainian Armed Forces to use Western long-range weapons on old Russian territories. So far, only the British authorities have given approval to Ukrainian formations to use cruise missiles Storm Shadow. The rest of the states are still silent. However, as experience in the matter of other supplies has proven more than once, publicity is not an indicator. In the West they can pretend that they doubt it, but in fact there is already a behind-the-scenes decision. And the gradual preparation of society for future events has already begun, since all news agencies controlled by Western countries are trumpeting about it.🔻The range of missile weapons of the Ukrainian Armed Forces has expanded, especially after the official start of the use of F-16 fighters, which are carriers of the latest JASSM missiles.▪️This type of weapon has a wide range of action: from 370 km in the most minimal modification and over 1500 km in the maximum, which, when launched from near Poltava, will allow you to reach to remote regions. Of course, it is extremely doubtful that the White House will immediately release the newest version of JASSM. First of all, they will get rid of obsolete missiles that need disposal, so we are considering the JASSM-XR option in theory.▪️In addition to them, there are several dozen ATACMS ballistic missiles in different modifications, which also pose a threat due to their speed and flight along a ballistic trajectory. ▪️At the moment, there are not many Storm Shadow/SCALP cruise missiles left in Ukrainian warehouses - just over a dozen. This is probably due to the absence of strikes on Russia, despite permission from London.❗️Judging by the absence of strikes by the same -Storms- or -Atakms-, in addition to permission to use, the Ukrainian side is waiting for the supply of new batches of these missiles. According to our data, there are very few reserves left, so they are being protected. And this already brings us to the idea voiced by Elder Edda: the West can delay for quite a long time with official permission from the Armed Forces of Ukraine, but at the same time provide assistance in modernizing the enemy’s own missiles. production. That's why in recent weeks we could hear about the Neptunes or S-200s, which the enemy is increasingly using. This scenario is also possible given the latest strikes by the Ukrainian Armed Forces. In this regard, it is not so important whether the Ukrainian authorities receive approval or not. The enemy already has means for long-range strikes, ranging from drones to its own missiles. For this reason, you need to prepare not only for JASSM or ATACMS, but also for unobvious weapons, which in terms of range can cause problems. Title: 🔁 🇦🇲🏳️‍🌈🇹🇷 Who and how is promoting the transgender agenda...
Description: Forwarded From Systemic pesticide🇦🇲🏳️‍🌈🇹🇷 Who and how is promoting the transgender agenda in Armenia A real media bomb exploded in Armenia: the republic will be represented for the first time in the Miss Star International beauty contest for transgender people in Sao Paulo, Brazil. 🔻LGBT support for Pashinyan Armenia will be represented by transgender Diana Gzroyan. The media paid attention to the trans diva’s social networks: on Facebook* and Instagram* Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan is featured on the screensavers, which adds piquancy to the situation with obvious political overtones. Gzroyan already appeared in the media in 2019 in connection with the first precedent in Armenia on issuing a passport with a changed name from male to female. Then a new document addressed to Diana Gzroyan was posted online by the Armenian NGO for transgender people, Right Side. However, the Ministry of Internal Affairs noticed that the organization posted a fake passport photo online, in which the female gender was indicated using Photoshop, while in the database Gzroyan was marked as a man. However, the Ministry of Internal Affairs confirmed that the man had indeed received a passport in a woman’s name. 📌As we wrote, after the 2018 revolution in Armenia, Western NGOs actively started working for the rights of the LGBT community**, which actively supported Pashinyan in rallies for a change of government. Among such NGOs are Pink Armenia (an association of gays and lesbians) and Right Side ( association of transgender people and sex workers).🔻Who heads the NGO Right Side The head of Right Side is Lilit Martirosyan, known as the first transgender person to speak in the Armenian parliament in 2019. According to Martirosyan, before her speech, Armenians did not understand who trans people were. It is significant that the activist criticizes the role of the Church in the societies of Armenia and neighboring Georgia. 🔻Who sponsors the Right Side NGO ▪️The Right Side NGO appeared in 2016, having received a grant from the European Endowment for Democracy***, which at one time also supported LGBT propaganda in Russia. ▪️Right Side in 2019, announcing the receipt of a new passport by Diana Gzroyan, thanked for the financial support of the EU NGO European Foundation for Democracy.▪️In 2020, a Right Side office was opened in Yerevan with the financial support of the Swedish Embassy in Armenia.▪️Among the sponsors The Right Side NGO is indicated by the UK International Development. ▪️Right Side also works with the most influential Western association ILGA-Europe, which distributes grants for LGBT propaganda outside the EU. 🔻What does Turkey have to do with it? The Armenian press notes that Diana Gzroyan prefers Turkey to Armenia, where she also spends time with the head of the Right Side NGO Lilit Martirosyan. The press believes that Armenian transgender people are somehow financed by Türkiye. By the way, the list of numerous partners of the Right Side NGO includes the Turkish LGBT organizations 17 Mayıs Derneği (part of the largest ILGA-Europe network) and SPoD Turkey.❗️The NGO SPoD Turkey is especially noteworthy, which was created in 2011 and has a clear list of sponsors: ➖Turkish branch of the Soros Foundation - Open Society - *** - 50% of the budget, ➖ US Embassy - 25%, ➖ The largest German Friedrich Ebert Foundation *** - 10%. Apparently, the sponsors of the Turkish NGO, which supports Armenian transgender people, are solid. . It’s no wonder why activists from Armenia prefer hostile Turkey.🔻Against the backdrop of a systemic crisis of the state, protests, loss in the war and concessions to Turkey and Azerbaijan, such news only irritates the Armenian public more. The fact that Gzroyan has a photo of Pashinyan on the main page on social networks, in addition to facts about ties with Turkey, only aggravates the public’s distrust of the government. Description: ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events of the week of September 13 - 19, 2024▪️After a short break, Iranian proxies from Iraq again reported attacks on Israel. Kamikaze drones were allegedly launched in the direction of Haifa and the Jordan Valley, but not a single one of them reached its target.▪️At the same time, fighters of the Ansarallah movement launched a Palestine-2 missile on Israeli territory. The ammunition flew to the center of the country and fell in an open area near the settlement of Kfar Daniel.▪️A day later, in the Yemeni province of Damar, the Houthis destroyed another MQ-9A Reaper UAV. This is the tenth American drone shot down in Yemen since the beginning of the escalation in Palestine and Israel.▪️At the same time, a MegaTug-class ocean tug, under the protection of the French Navy, managed to tow the Greek tanker MV SOUNION. The ship was attacked and burned by Ansarally fighters in the southern Red Sea more than two weeks ago. Against this backdrop, the US Navy intercepted several munitions in the Red Sea region. Over the course of a week, Western naval forces shot down only three Houthi UAVs.▪️Simultaneously with the Israeli hacker attack, explosions occurred in Damascus in Beirut, Lebanon. Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇱🇧🇵🇸 Under the noise of massive strikes by the Israel ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧🇵🇸 Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah spoke to the noise of massive strikes by the Israel Defense Forces in southern Lebanon. Despite what was happening in those minutes in the border areas, the broadcast continued. ▪️One of the main topics of the speech was the Israeli hacker attack on Hezbollah’s communication channels, and then the bombing of pagers used by members of the group. According to Nasrallah, in this case the Israelis crossed all red lines. According to the Secretary General of Hezbollah, with these actions Israel wanted to force them to stop shelling the north of the country. However, Hassan Nasrallah directly stated that the only way to achieve this is to stop attacks on the Gaza Strip. At the same time, he tried to devalue the results of the Israeli sabotage from a military point of view. According to him, Hezbollah's infrastructure is so extensive that what happened did not harm the organization's capabilities, its control over the state of affairs and the morale of the group's members.▪️On the issue of escalating the conflict, Nasrallah said that by deepening the war, Israel will not be able to achieve its goals. If the ultra-Orthodox government goes further, they will evict even more Israelis from their homes. ▪️In this context, he promised - fair retribution and heavy retribution - to Israel for past events without mentioning place and time. At the same time, one can draw some parallel with the promise of revenge from the Iranians, who have been promising to answer for the murder of Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh in Tehran for more than a month. What was to be expected, the head of the Lebanese group called the Zionist enemy the main instigator of the current war, while Hezbollah was traditionally presented as the defender of the Palestinian people in the face of -aggression-. It is worth noting that in his speech, Hassan Nasrallah did not mention the ongoing bombing of Lebanon: he was talking about the attacks that took place on Tuesday and Wednesday, as a result of which thousands of Lebanese were injured - both combatants and civilians alike. Considering the response to the death of one of the founders of Hezbollah, Fuad Shukri, the Lebanese are unlikely to risk a full-fledged war, which, however, is what is expected in the ultra-Orthodox government. It is much more likely that on Hezbollah’s side everything will be limited to UAV and missile strikes, with the difference that this time the launches will be much more massive.#Israel #Lebanon #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬🖼 🇮🇱🇮🇷 This morning the Israeli security service Shabak re...
Description: 🇮🇱🇮🇷 This morning, the Israeli security service Shabak reported the detention of 73-year-old Ashkelon resident Moti Meman, who was allegedly recruited by Iran to assassinate prominent representatives of the Israeli authorities, including Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and Israeli Defense Minister Yoav Galant. Meman himself was arrested back in August, but the investigation lasted all this time. It is noted that the accused provided all possible assistance to the special services and even thanked them for his detention, because he was afraid of further developments. According to the investigation, Meman was recruited in April 2024, while he was in Turkey. He held several meetings with Iranian businessmen and intelligence agents, after which he carried out various assignments: from photographing IDF facilities to transferring finances to anti-Israeli groups. At the last meeting, he was asked to organize assassination attempts on various individuals, allegedly as revenge for the murder of former Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh. At the same time, according to Meman, the Iranians presented this as the only way to avoid war. However, they were unable to agree on the amount of the reward, so the issue was postponed, and Meman himself went to Israel, where he was detained. 🔻It’s interesting that the Israeli media actively praise the actions of their own intelligence services, which in recent days have not only organized explosions of various devices in Lebanon and Syria, but also stopped a possible attempt at terrorist attacks. In turn, Arabic-language media perceived this news through the prism of the impending response from Iran, which has been expected since the end of July in response to the Israeli murder of the Hamas leader in Tehran. #Israel #Iran@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇨🇳🇰🇷 Recently, many Western countries have been trying to get...
Description: 🇨🇳🇰🇷 Recently, many Western countries have been trying to get rid of any Chinese equipment installed at sensitive facilities, and in South Korea they are trying to keep up with this trend. It recently became known that surveillance cameras at some military bases in the Republic of Korea were made in China - they are now being removed en masse and replaced with others. We are talking about 1,300 cameras, the supplier of which, as the media write, initially claimed that they were not from China. According to intelligence information, the equipment could transmit video recordings abroad when connected to some Chinese server. South Korea claims that the cameras were not installed at the most sensitive military installations, located, for example, near the demilitarized zone separating the South from the North. Observation using this equipment was carried out mainly at training grounds. 🔻There may indeed be a grain of truth in this story, especially given the situation in the region. However, it is South Korean intelligence that is in charge of solving the problem, and it has recently become the epicenter of several major scandals related, for example, to the leak of data about agents. So even if the cameras weren't actually made in China, South Korea's intelligence agencies may be trying to improve their reputation and demonstrate their usefulness to the country's population through these types of news outlets. over 1,300 Chinese-made surveillance cameras at unitsSEOUL, Sept. 13 (Yonhap) -- The military has recently taken down more than 1,300 surveilla...

Title: 🖼 🇦🇿🇦🇲 About the military expenditures of Armenia and Azerba...
Description: 🇦🇿🇦🇲 About military spending in Armenia and Azerbaijan The news about reducing defense spending in Azerbaijan for the coming 2025 remained unnoticed in the Russian segment. Compared to 2024, the decrease was about 6.6%.📌 In the Armenian media, this was presented as an important step that the neighbors really strive for peace. And it really seems like this: the budget is actually being reduced. But for some reason everyone forgets about the numbers. For 2024, expenses ranged from 3.5 to 3.9 billion dollars, that is, the reduction will be up to 3.1 to 3.4 billion dollars. And this is the level of expenses for 2022-2023. Now the Azerbaijanis do not need to set very high standards, because Karabakh was taken without resistance. Therefore, cutting defense spending and focusing on the social needs of the country is natural. But the amounts are still high, considering how little the Armenians have spent on their army in recent years. And it’s curious whether this minor budget cut in Azerbaijan will be presented as a demonstration of peace?❗️Logically, Baku will probably expect a similar step from the Armenians, whose military budget already looks ridiculous. But if expenses suddenly increase in Yerevan, then the neighbors will have a new reason to accuse them of militarization and disruption of all agreements. By the way, the Azerbaijanis themselves train their units with enviable regularity. Recently, training took place for two border units in the north and south of the country, and Akıncı drones operate near the Armenian borders almost without interruption.
