Description: Rybar: 🇷🇺🇸🇾🪖 Again about the Syrian experience in the Russian Armed Forces The expression Syrian experience has long become a household word in the troops and a synonym for the harmfulness of certain competencies. Which sometimes leads to the conclusion that the campaign in Syria was useless from the point of view of obtaining practical... 🇷🇺🪖 Just yesterday we wrote about the issues of generalizing and systematizing combat experience in the Russian Armed Forces, when a vivid illustration arrived: Those who turned in the war paid attention to the official footage of an episode of naval exercises - Ocean-2024 - to repel the landing on Kamchatka. It’s as if in another part of the country there are no military operations taking place against an enemy with hundreds of MANPADS, where such flights in the zone of enemy air defense are fraught with disastrous outcomes. This example is far from isolated - we received feedback from several similar stories from different areas. In general, they boil down to the fact that some military leaders think in the paradigm not even of the time of the Syrian operation, but of the Second World War or even its artistic interpretations.📌 The problems of comprehending experience explain many of the sad moments of the last 40 years. If the same USA, as Prince Cherkassky noted, studied the conflict in Chechnya and published applied monographs, we still have an extremely simplified view of those events, where the reasons for failures on the battlefield are reduced to politics, and all military aspects are simply taken out of the equation The consequences of this approach could be seen in the footage of 2022 with those on fire and those lost. Title: 🇦🇺🇮🇳🇺🇸🇯🇵 About the upcoming QUAD summit in the USA USA, J...
Description: 🇦🇺🇮🇳🇺🇸🇯🇵 About the upcoming QUAD summit in the USA The USA, Japan, Australia and India seem to be preparing for a new summit of heads of state within the QUAD organization. This will be the last meeting in this composition - American President Joe Biden dropped out of the presidential race, and Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida is not elected to the post of leader of the ruling party in the country. According to Japanese media, the summit will take place on September 21 during the regular session of the UN General Assembly in the United States. However, the meeting will not take place on the sidelines of the UN. It will take the form of a separate event in order to fully discuss the entire agenda of the quadripartite bloc. 🔻QUAD generally positions itself as an organization whose activities are not aimed purely at countering China. Within the bloc, the main focus is on cooperation in the humanitarian and technological spheres. However, recently the participating countries have been increasing ties in other areas, including military. A good example is the annual exercise -Malabar-, in which previously only military personnel from India and the United States participated - now representatives of Japan and Australia are permanent participants. ▪️For example, statements by the Australian Minister of Foreign Affairs speak towards the anti-Chinese orientation of QUAD. She emphasized that the Quartet seeks to prevent the dominance of any power in the region, hinting at the PRC. Against the background of the shift of the main point of tension in the region from the Indian-Chinese border to the South China Sea, we can say that QUAD has disappeared from the radar. A possible summit could return the bloc to the field of active discussion, emphasizing that no one has forgotten about this organization. Considering how bilateral and multilateral alliances are being created (or modernized) in the region under the auspices of the United States, a new security architecture aimed at containing the PRC is gradually being formalized in the Asia-Pacific region. And QUAD, even despite possible internal contradictions and connections to the confrontation with Beijing, the Philippines continues to remain its main part. #Australia #India #USA #Japan @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Donetsk direction: Liberation of Krasnohorivka and as...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Donetsk direction: Liberation of Krasnohorivka and assault on Ostrogo Situation as of 15:00 on September 13, 2024 Russian troops continue their rapid offensive in the direction of Kurakhovo, methodically breaking through the enemy’s defenses. It was on this section of the front that the Russian Armed Forces first used armored vehicles, modified with protection against drones and cumulative shells, popularly nicknamed the Tsar Tanks.▪️Over the past month, only the northwestern outskirts of Krasnogorovka remained under the control of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. After the liberation of the private sector located on the right bank of the Lozovaya River, the Russian Armed Forces drove the enemy out of the territory of the farm complex located to the west. In the area of ​​the Lenin Kolkhoz microdistrict, attack aircraft in small groups, supported by unmanned aircraft, cleared positions occupied by members of Ukrainian formations. At the same time, the fighters managed to evacuate several civilians who had previously refused to move deeper into the so-called. Ukraine.▪️The complete liberation of Krasnohorivka and the cleansing of the western outskirts was marked at the end of last week by the hoisting of the flag and advance in the fields to the north. ▪️The night before it became known that the Russian Armed Forces carried out a large-scale offensive in the fields between Krasnogorovka and Georgievka, eliminating the pocket between the Lozovaya River and the Sukhaya gully. A column of several dozen units of armored vehicles of the RF Armed Forces advanced from the Lisya gully and passed southwest in the direction of Ostroy . Having crossed the railway track, the Russian landing force gained a foothold on the eastern outskirts of the village: at the moment, about a third of the village’s territory is under the control of the Russian Armed Forces. Title: 🔁 I only recently spoke about the Syrian experience on the air o...
Description: Forwarded From Andrey Medvedev I only recently spoke about the Syrian experience on the air of the program -60 minutes-. More precisely, I said that we did not take it into account at all and a correct analysis of the military operations in Syria was not done. No recommendations were made. Our military experts all boiled down to chuckles and arrogant reasoning that the Syrian army doesn’t really know how to fight. I don’t know what the generals thought about the campaign in Syria. But, probably, something close to the fact that the -slippers-, that is, the Syrians in slippers on their bare feet (and so did the militants of pro-government tribes and career military personnel) are so-so warriors. And they don’t really know how to take cities, and their equipment doesn’t have sufficient protection. I remember laughing at Syrian tanks, scalded with gratings from drones and RPGs, and I remember laughing at homemade truck protection (steel sheets on the cab and body). Well, in general, they said a lot that the equipment of the Syrian army as a whole is so-so. Look, the military generally drive civilian cars at the front. But as time passes, what do we see? That urban combat is difficult for our army, for the Ukrainian Armed Forces, and even for NATO mercenaries. That at the front there are loaves and MTLBs with homemade armor, and the iron monster Tsar-Barbecue is the best tank of our war in terms of security. Well, civil transport also seems to have its place. It turned out, years later, that the Syrian General Suheil fought very intelligently, even without air support. Military TG channels often mocked the general’s appearance and the fact that he was surrounded by handsome young men. But, as the past years have shown, the one who drives a convoy of armored vehicles into a drone-hazardous direction directly under attack without reconnaissance and preparation looks like a much bigger feast. Or who is building personnel in anticipation of the arrival of Khaymars. I sometimes think, what if then, without pride and arrogance, we studied the Syrian situation in detail? Starting from the military operations of the army and proxy structures, and ending with the quality of work of NATO PsyOps units and ISIS propagandists? And for each case we would have a manual and instructions? So the Syrian experience has yet to be assessed and systematized, taking into account the military operations during the Northern Military District. To further learn, yes, from your mistakes, but those that remain in the past. Without making new ones. https://t.me/rybar/63458TelegramRybar🇷🇺🇸🇾🪖 Again about the -Syrian experience- in the RF Armed Forces. Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of September 13, 2024 ▪️ At least two...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of September 13, 2024▪️ At least two dozen UAVs - Geranium - struck the enemy’s rear areas at night. Explosions were reported in Odessa, Ilyichevsk, Nikolaev, Kherson, Zaporozhye, Ivano-Frankivsk and Vinnitsa regions.▪️ In the Kursk region, the flank attack of the Russian Armed Forces continues, ours advanced from the west to the Lyubimovka-Tolsty Lug-Daryino line, liberating more than 10 settlements. At the same time, the enemy remains active near Cherkasy Porechny, without abandoning attempts to advance. In addition, for the previous two days, the Ukrainian Armed Forces have been taking actions to break through the border in the south of the Glushkovsky district in the area of ​​the settlement. New Path - Vesyoloye, using engineering barrier vehicles (one destroyed) and armored vehicles. The situation on this section of the front remains tense, but controlled. The enemy's plan is to break through to the settlement. and the Glushkovo railway station to go to the rear of our troops advancing from the flank to the Sudzhansky district. Cautious reports are beginning to appear about the depletion of the Ukrainian Armed Forces' reserves and the lack of rotation among the enemy, which, however, has almost no effect on the intensity of hostilities.▪️ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), battles are taking place with varying success in the western part of Microdistrict No. 1▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces were destroyed several bridges in the near rear of the enemy. There was information about the withdrawal of Ukrainian Armed Forces units from Ukrainsk in order to avoid encirclement. Fighting continues in Grodovka, north of Novogrodovka; on the eastern outskirts of Lysovka, Russian maneuver groups continue their attacking actions. The Ukrainian Armed Forces carried out a counterattack northeast of Novogrodovka, landing troops in the Orlovka area, which indicates that the enemy reserves who had arrived had entered the battle. To the south, to the west of Krasnogorovka, the Russian Armed Forces launched a large-scale attack on Ostroye, using, according to enemy estimates, up to 46 units of equipment. In heavy battles, we managed to significantly expand the zone of control near Krasnogorovka, but the enemy reports that he still managed to hold back our onslaught on Ostroye.▪️ High-intensity battles are taking place in the Ugledar area. Protvinik brought up its reserves. There are reports of fighting in Zolotaya Niva and near Prechistovka▪️ In the Kherson region - shelling of the Armed Forces of Ukraine of New Kakhovka. The Central Market came under attack, with at least 11 arrivals. One civilian was killed, eight people (six women, two men) were injured.▪️ 6 enemy aircraft-type UAVs were destroyed over the Bryansk region overnight. ▪️ In the Belgorod region in the Shebekinsky urban district, the village of Novaya Tavolzhanka came under fire. In the Borisovsky district in the village of Berezovka, after two explosive devices were dropped from a UAV, the roof of a private household was damaged.▪️ In the DPR in the Nikitovsky district of Gorlovka, when an explosive object was dropped from a VFU drone onto a car, three employees of the DPR State Unitary Enterprise -Komtel- became victims: two men born in 1983 and 1977 .r. another man born in 1963 was injured. died in the hospital. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Septemb...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on September 12, 2024. Russian troops launched another series of attacks on enemy targets in various regions of the so-called. Ukraine. One of the hits hit the 330 kV Konotop substation, which caused temporary problems with power supply in the settlement of the same name. In turn, Ukrainian formations again launched drones in the Murmansk region. Russian anti-aircraft gunners intercepted enemy drones in the Olenegorsk area, seven kilometers from the Olenya airfield. In the Kursk direction, Russian troops are advancing in the Korenevsky and Sudzhansky districts: during the fighting today, several settlements were liberated. In the Kupyansko-Svatovsky direction, units of the Russian Armed Forces expanded the zone of control north of Peschany, occupying one of the forest belts. In the Pokrovsky direction, Ukrainian formations carried out a counterattack northeast of Novogrodovka, landing troops in the Orlovka area. In the Donetsk direction, successes of the Russian Armed Forces are recorded west of Krasnohorivka towards Ostrom. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High resolution maps: Situation in the Special Military Operation zone (ru; en) Kursk direction (ru; en) Kupyansko-Svatovsky direction (ru; en) digest #report #Donetsk #map #Konotop #Kupyansk #Kursk #Murmansk #Pokrovsk #Russia #Ukraine #Ugledar@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: counterattacks of the Russian army...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: counterattacks of the Russian army in the Sudzhansky and Korenevsky districts situation towards the end on September 12, 2024 In the Kursk region, Russian units are building on the success of the previous days, displacing the Armed Forces of Ukraine from many previously occupied settlements.🔻In the Korenevsky district, the Russian Armed Forces cleared a settlement Krasnooktyabrskoe. The Russian troops received an abandoned International MaxxPro armored car as a trophy. The enemy also attacked an assault group in the Vishnevka area with a drone, and later its release was reported to the Russian Ministry of Defense. And in Snagosti, a squad of Ukrainian fighters fell into an organized ambush on the southern outskirts of the village: a minibus, along with members of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, was shot at point-blank range from an RPG.▪️In addition, Russian troops liberated Obukhovka and advanced in the direction of the Pokrovsky farm, Sudzhansky district. The enemy was driven out of the outskirts of Byakhovo, Gordeevka, Vnezapny and Viktorovka. At the same time, further north in Olgovka, fighting is still ongoing, where the Russian Armed Forces are repelling attempts by the Armed Forces of Ukraine to penetrate deep into the Russian defense.🔻In the Glushkovsky district, Ukrainian formations continue to unsuccessfully attack in the direction of the outskirts of the settlements of Medvezhye and Novy Put. The last mine clearing vehicle IMR-2 even managed to drive several hundred meters before it hit a mine. Currently, fighting continues in the area of ​​the state border line, the enemy’s attempts to gain a foothold in the villages have been thwarted. In the Sudzhansky district, Russian infantry fighting vehicles shot at point-blank Ukrainian positions in Russkaya Konopelka, at the moment the village is for the most part under the control of the Russian Armed Forces. Fighting continues in the Martynovka and Fanaseevka areas.▪️The enemy published footage of shelling of Russian positions in the Malaya Lokni area. However, due to the absence of destruction in the village in the published video, most likely the footage is archival. Title: 🇷🇺🇸🇾🪖 Again about the -Syrian experience- in the RF Armed Fo...
Description: 🇷🇺🇸🇾🪖 Again about the -Syrian experience- in the RF Armed Forces. The expression -Syrian experience- has long become a household word in the troops and a synonym for the harmfulness of certain competencies. Which sometimes leads to the conclusion that the campaign in Syria was useless from the point of view of gaining practical skills and combat training. It is still worth noting here that the fighting in the Syrian Arab Republic itself was an excellent opportunity to test domestic weapons, control systems and skills personnel - even the top officials spoke openly about this. The question is who learned what. If the distribution of humanitarian aid in Maaloula, patrolling in a convoy of Tyfunovs and BTR-82A, TsPVS and grinning at the Syrian slippers was taken as the Syrian experience, then he really could not help but turn out to be stupid. However, not everyone did this.📌 For example, the backbone of the same PMC - Wagner - was formed in Syria. Under almost the same conditions, they were able to gain a completely different experience and scale it to their training system. As a result, in 2022, they adapted much faster than others to the new realities on the battlefield. As Alexander Kharchenko noted, without the Syrian campaign, by the beginning of the Northern Military District, we would not have had not only -Lancets- and -Krasnopolei-, but even -Orlans-. And we would have to be content with the limited experience of Donbass, which the Russian Armed Forces during the years of the Minsk agreements assimilated even more poorly. In this context, by the way, it’s time to ask another question: how are things going with the centralized systematization of the experience of 2022-2024? And are past mistakes actually taken into account in shaping feedback to avoid similar problems in the future? #VSRF #Russia #Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇮🇱🇮🇷🇸🇾 Israeli media writes about the alleged kidnapping of...
Description: 🇮🇱🇮🇷🇸🇾 About the alleged kidnapping of Iranian officers in Syria by the IDF, Israeli media write that simultaneously with the recent massive air raid on the city of Masyaf in the Syrian province of Hama, a ground operation was carried out, during which several Iranian officers were kidnapped from the territory of the Research Center. Allegedly, after fighter strikes, Israeli helicopters entered the territory of the Arab Republic, landed troops in the area of ​​the research institute and captured from two to four senior officers from the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps. Then the object was mined.▪️The primary source of the news was the Syrian opposition channel Syria TV broadcasting from Turkey. He referred to some exclusive data and information leaks, but no confirmation of what happened was provided. Neither the IDF press service nor official Syrian and Iranian resources confirmed the fact of the operation. The only thing you can rely on is rumors about helicopters flying in Tartus in the direction of Masyaf, dating back to the time of the air attack.🔻And although it is not known for certain what actually happened, with a high degree of probability there are reports of an IDF landing operation with the kidnapping of Iranian military personnel is an injection of supporters of the Syrian Spring. And this case fits perfectly with the theses of anti-government propagandists located in Turkey about the inability of the criminal Assad regime to independently defend itself from Zionist aggression. #Israel #Iran #Syria #Hama@rybarSupport usThe Times of IsraelReports: Israeli troops raided IRGC weapons facility in Syria, took equipment, documentsDuring major attack by jets earlier this week, commandos said to have rappeled from helicopters to capture Iranians and remove materials before destroying site

Title: 🎬 🇷🇺 Statements by Russian President Vladimir Putin at the ple...
Description: 🇷🇺 Statements by Russian President Vladimir Putin at the plenary session of the X St. Petersburg International Forum of United Cultures🔻Main points: ▪️Russia sees the consequences for individuals of the dehumanization of ruling regimes in a number of countries.▪️The agenda that is being imposed today often insults religions and the culture of many peoples, many countries do not like this.▪️We in Russia have decided on the main values ​​for us and defend these values ​​and everyone who shares them - who, like us, considers sacred the right of people to speak their native language and keep the faith of our fathers, live in harmony with nature according to its natural laws.▪️We do not fight against other values, we support our own, this is the difference in approaches between us and our opponents.▪️Culture has always been a fuse for the world, but in a number of countries it , seems to have burned out.▪️Many high-ranking politicians today have lost moral boundaries and are violating taboos that persisted even during the Cold War.▪️Culture should and can exist without interference, without -cancel culture-.▪️There are many appeals from cultural figures, not those who want to squeeze neoliberal standards into a Procrustean bed▪️Creative, scientific and educational activities can resist discord.▪️Russia initially developed as a multinational state, which was reflected in our traditions.#digest #Russia @rybar Support us

Title: 🇺🇸🇬🇧💰On the decline of the era of decentralized crypto The p...
Description: 🇺🇸🇬🇧💰On the decline of the era of decentralized crypto The process of introducing financial control mechanisms in the crypto industry is almost complete. All issuers and/or platforms in the Anglo-Saxon circuit are either directly accountable to the SEC and IRA (US Internal Revenue Service) or are secretly collaborating with the CIA. ▪️US and British intelligence services have obligated all crypto exchanges to implement KYC and AML systems over the past two years.▪️Vivid examples are the cases of FTX and Binance. In both cases, the creators and managers of crypto-platforms ended up in prison. And if in the case of FTX the fate of the site has not yet been determined, then in the case of Binance, the exchange simply received a leader loyal to the authorities and was integrated into the financial system of the Anglo-Saxon circuit.▪️The most stringent regulation is being implemented in the EU. They adopted a set of documents regulating the circulation of MICA crypto-assets. In parallel, the EU also adopted the Digital Services Act (DSA). Came into force on February 17, 2024. 🔻The fruits of crypto-democracy There has been a real hunt for Russians in the field of finance and crypto for a long time. The most resonant cases: ▪️Arrest of the head of the BTC Banker bot Anatoly Legkodymov in the USA. The founder and largest co-owner of the service was accused of fraud of $700 million and received a real sentence. The very wording of the indictment is interesting, which states that the owner of the service was aware that his platform was being used for illegal activities. ▪️Tornado Cash creator Alexey Pertsev was recently detained in the Netherlands, accused of money laundering through his platform and received 64 months in prison.▪️Pavel Lerner, who was previously kidnapped for ransom in Kyiv in 2017, was arrested in Spain in 2023.▪️ On December 14, 2023, French police detained a Russian at Paris airport based solely on suspicion of links to the hacker group Hive. His name and current status are not mentioned in open sources.▪️This list complements the report of the detention in Argentina of a Russian who is suspected of collaborating with the North Korean Lazarus group and receiving income from illegal activities. The name of the suspect has not been disclosed, the wording of the charges is as vague as possible.▪️The high-profile case of Alexander Vinnik (BTC-E exchange), who was arrested in Greece for using a crypto exchange to allegedly launder more than $9 billion, ended in extradition to the United States.▪️In this context, the story of the arrest of Pavel Durov no longer looks like an exception.🔻Who are the beneficiaries? The colossal resources of Western intelligence services aimed at regulating the issue and circulation of digital assets indicate a direct order from large financial players. And the largest player in this field is BlackRock and affiliated structures.BlackRock IBIT became the world's largest institutional holder of Bitcoin with 357,509 Bitcoin as of September 1, 2024, according to the latest data from HODL15Capital. By comparison, stablecoin giant Tether is in fifth place with 75,354 bitcoins. The efforts of these and other large companies are aimed at creating an interface for the integration of the crypto market and traditional finance, which is impossible without the introduction of generally accepted financial control mechanisms. This will allow the sale of high-risk crypto products to fairly conservative stock market investors in an ETF shell and will launch the process of a large-scale flow of investments from traditional financial instruments to crypto. BlackRock management clearly wants to make money on this. #globalism #crypto #economics@rybar together with @econopovalypseSupport usProject -Rybar -How US intelligence agencies seize control of the crypto market Now official - Tether is collaborating with the FBI, the US Internal Revenue Service (IRS), the US Department of Justice ( DOJ) and other regulatory authorities.

Title: 🇨🇳🇸🇳 During the China-Africa Forum in Beijing, special attent...
Description: 🇨🇳🇸🇳 During the China-Africa Forum in Beijing, special attention was paid to economic cooperation. In addition to debt relief, companies from the PRC showed interest in expanding into African markets. Thus, the car manufacturer WBM decided to create production in Senegal. For this purpose, a memorandum of understanding was signed between the Chinese company and the Senegalese CCBM within the framework of the forum. Under the terms of the agreement, WBM production will soon be localized in the African country. 🔻This fact is very indicative in comparison with Russian companies. While the Chinese are planning to localize the production of their cars in Africa in a short time, there has only been a dialogue going on with KAMAZ for the last couple of years about the same thing. Therefore, let us once again emphasize that if a reorientation to Africa is taking place, then many initiatives and the successful promotion of Russian business in the region require coordinated work of various departments and a clear decision-making system. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Alexander-Kalinovsky direction: battles in the Dzerzh...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Alexander-Kalinovsky direction: fighting in the Dzerzhinsk agglomeration and advance in Nelepovkasituation as of 17:00 on September 12, 2024 Russian troops continue to break into Ukrainian defenses in the Dzerzhinsk agglomeration. Units of the Russian Armed Forces are conducting assault operations in dense urban areas, getting closer and closer to the center of Dzerzhinsk.▪️Almost all of Druzhba, with the exception of the northernmost street, has come under the control of Russian troops. Simultaneously with the liberation of Druzhba, the fighting in Kirovo is coming to its logical conclusion, where several streets on the western outskirts remain under the control of the Ukrainian Armed Forces: Russian troops have entrenched themselves on Shcherbinovskaya, 3rd International and Tchaikovsky streets. After their capture, the opportunity will open up to advance both further along the railway in the direction of Dachnoye and to the southwest, taking the enemy garrison in Dzerzhinsk in pincers from the flank.▪️To the south there are battles in Dzerzhinsk. Russian troops took control of microdistrict No. 1 at the entrance to the city, occupied the territory of the penal colony and the local bakery. At the same time, there has not yet been any information about the occupation of positions on the waste heap of the Novaya mine. Control over the height will provide an overview of the adjacent forest to the southwest of the mine.▪️The Ukrainian command transferred the 12th brigade of the NGU -Azov- to the Novgorodsky (New York) area. The Ukrainian formations that arrived to strengthen their positions immediately posted footage of their work on the Internet, thanks to which it was possible to establish that Russian troops control at least 60% of Nelepovka.🔻A notable event of the week was also the confrontation - flag dumps - on the territory of the elevator of the phenol plant in Novgorod. First, Ukrainian formations from the 53rd ombre posted footage of their flag attached to a magnet. And then Russian troops published the moment the flag was dropped from an FPV drone in the same place. Afterwards, another video appeared, this time from the ground, where a fighter was planting a flag on one of the outer houses at the exit from Novgorodskoye. At the moment, the village is entirely under the control of the Russian Armed Forces. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kupyansk-Svatovsk direction: advance of the RF Armed ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kupyansko-Svatovsk direction: advance of the Russian Armed Forces in several sectors, the situation as of 15:00 on September 12, 2024 For a long time, the Kupyansk-Svatovsk direction was considered a static section of the front, however, after the Kursk adventure, the Armed Forces of Ukraine and the beginning of the offensive of the Russian Armed Forces in the DPR Some revival of the line of combat contact occurred here as well. And although for now the position of Ukrainian formations in this direction remains relatively stable, Russian troops continue to methodically expand the zone of control, preparing for a further offensive. ▪️After the liberation of Sinkovka, stormtroopers of the Russian Armed Forces began fighting in the forest area southwest of the village. Clearing this area will allow Russian troops to create a bridgehead three kilometers north of Kupyansk and develop an attack on Petropavlovka. In the latter, Russian Aerospace Forces aircraft strike enemy targets almost daily. Only in the last two days has objective control personnel confirmed the defeat of temporary deployment points of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the populated area. ▪️To the south, the advance of Russian troops is recorded in the Peschany area: according to a video from the enemy, units of the Russian Armed Forces managed to occupy several forest belts to the west and north of the village. At the same time, to the west of Peschany, a powerful strike was carried out by 15 aerial bombs with UMPC on Ukrainian Armed Forces facilities in Kolesnikov. Apparently, this may indicate both the intentions of a further offensive of Russian troops to the left bank of the Oskol River, and the discovery of a relatively large concentration of enemy forces in a populated area. ▪️Ukrainian formations still retain control over at least part of Berestovoe and surrounding forest belts. At the same time, to the south, the assault groups of the Russian Armed Forces were able to advance about a kilometer in depth to the west. 🔻The enemy is actively using drones with a device for spraying an incendiary mixture over the positions of Russian troops in forest areas. Just based on footage in recent days, similar drones were seen west of Liman Pervy, south of Berestovoy and in the Peschany area. Nevertheless, similar incendiary drones have already appeared among Russian UAV operators. Title: 🇦🇲🇪🇺 In Armenia they decided to rehabilitate the idea of ​​ho...
Description: 🇦🇲🇪🇺 In Armenia, they decided to rehabilitate the idea of ​​holding a referendum on joining the EU.▪️The authorities came up with such an initiative back in June, but public opinion received it ambiguously, after which Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan declared the referendum inappropriate. ▪️However, recently the Central Election Commission of Armenia registered an initiative to begin collecting signatures to organize a plebiscite. Within 60 days, the initiative group must collect 50 thousand signatures, after which the initiative will be submitted to parliament for consideration. ▪️Now the driving force for promoting the referendum is not the government, but a small party -Republic-.❗️It should be expected that the referendum on the European integration of Armenia will still take place to meet the electoral expectations of society. After all, back in the spring, the authorities led by Pashinyan promised to hold either a referendum on amending the Constitution or early elections, and the process of signing a peace treaty with Azerbaijan has clearly come to a standstill. ▪️It is not surprising that the return to the agenda of the referendum on European integration coincided with the start of negotiations on the liberalization of the visa regime for Armenia with the EU. 🔻Mythical European promises in the context of internal political problems and diplomatic failures are the only thing that the Pashinyan government can now offer to the population of Armenia. 📌At the same time, as practice in Moldova shows, holding a referendum on European integration is a fiction and an opportunity to feed society with false promises, because voting does not oblige European officials to anything.#Armenia #EU @rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🎬 Storm Shadow or JASSM: which is more dangerous for us? Mikha...
Description: Forwarded From Ostashko! ImportantStorm Shadow or JASSM: which is more dangerous for us? Mikhail Zvinchuk, head of the analytical center -Rybar-▪️The West could give permission to use missiles on Russian territory in the summer of 2022 if it wanted. However, the escalation occurs gradually. At the same time, the volume of military assistance to Ukraine is not so large now, but many deliveries take place behind the scenes, and then they are legalized: for example, they transferred F-16s, and to them JASSM cruise missiles.▪️Storm Shadow missiles: our air defense systems are more than familiar with them . Perhaps for some air defense units in the Bryansk, Kursk, and Belgorod regions this will be a new experience. But at the same time, our entire air defense system is centralized. ✔️Storm Shadow will now be used because massive drone strikes did not give the desired result.▪️The complex use of missiles in the concept of NATO multi-domain operation is dangerous for us. Similar operations are being practiced in Crimea: this is a combination of satellite reconnaissance equipment, observers and spotters on the ground, the use first of drones, then of cruise missiles, then of operational-tactical missiles. Separately, we learned to cope with the same ATACMS, as last night in the Zaporozhye region: everything was shot down. The situation at the front.▪️In August, the Ukrainian Armed Forces were preparing not only for striking in the Kursk region, but also in other directions: options were calculated in the Kherson and Zaporozhye regions. Not only did they fail to implement the plan for the first 10-20 days, they were forced to withdraw reserves that were preparing for this offensive.▪️We also see that the Ukrainian Armed Forces are now throwing unprepared units into the DPR, which would have to recapture the same Ukrainsk or defend Selidovo. It seems that the Ukrainian formations are gradually surrendering to the DPR.▪️Of course, we have a huge, hard job ahead of us, but now we are actually tearing apart the front that has stood for a long time. Our troops are approaching Mirnograd and Pokrovsk. We are approaching Kurakhovo from the north, gradually tightening the ring around the group north of Krasnogorovka. The fighting near Ugledar has now intensified.▪️The rest of the front is relatively stable. In the Svatovo-Kupyansk direction there is still a positional struggle, as well as near Seversk. In the Orekhovsky and Kherson areas too. ▪️But the Armed Forces of Ukraine do not give up attempts to probe our defenses at unexpected points and try to study our tactics. Yesterday's attempt to land on gas fields in the Black Sea is not such an unsuccessful operation: Ukrainian forces and British SAS instructors and advisers, who are obsessed with conducting naval operations, are studying the tactics of Russian troops' response. And they get answers. A game is being played where the bargaining chip is Ukrainian cannon fodder.#important Video is too big

Title: 🇷🇺🇺🇦🖇 In addition to the -unsuccessful- operation of the Ukr...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦🖇 In addition to the -unsuccessful- operation of the Ukrainian Armed Forces to seize the drilling platform -Crimea-2-Yesterday’s attack by Ukrainian forces on the Golitsyn gas field only formally ended in failure for the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Yes, several lost boats and landing groups without any visible result in capturing the platform can form the impression of another suicidal attack. But this impression is false. The task of the Ukrainian Armed Forces and British curators (who are behind the preparation of every naval operation with the participation of Ukrainian special forces) was to test the Russian defense system and evaluate our response to the attack. The Ukrainian command knows that the Russian Armed Forces have reconnaissance capabilities and means that can determine the exits of the BEC. And, accordingly, they will look for them. Therefore, the next step will be to work on eliminating our intelligence complexes. The Ukrainian Armed Forces will try to strike remotely or suppress our electronic warfare systems capable of detecting their equipment. Unfortunately, during the sortie, the Ukrainian formations still managed to hit a Russian Su-30 from a MANPADS installed on board the boat. Title: 🖼 🇮🇳🇨🇳🇺🇸 The faster the temperature rises in China's relat...
Description: 🇮🇳🇨🇳🇺🇸 The faster the temperature in China’s relations with the United States and allies grows, the more often we see Indian units interacting with American troops in joint exercises. Only recently did Air Force training over Indian territory - Tarang Shakti - end. Almost at the same time, the Indians participated in the Pitch Black exercise in Australia. And now there are also participants from India in Kakadu training. This year, bilateral exercises were also held between India and the United States with the participation of American B-52H bombers, and last year B-1B aircraft were even based for a short time in India.🔻The point is , that no matter how much India talks about distancing itself from all regional conflicts, strained relations with China and the growing appetites of the Celestial Empire force it to react in such a simple way. Yesterday, on the border with Pakistan at the Mahajan training ground, the bilateral Yudh Abhyas exercise of the US and Indian ground forces began the use of battalion tactical groups in difficult terrain in special operations. Unlike previous years, this year the scale of training has increased. From the usual tactical maneuvers by infantry units, this time they are using HIMARS MLRS and even Stryker armored personnel carriers, which New Delhi is considering as an option to replace the BMP-2. Of course, in India all this is presented as a standard planned event, but we don’t think that in Beijing it will be regarded so friendly. The number of exercises is growing, and India is becoming an increasingly frequent participant, so the reaction will be quite logical. A few weeks ago, when the Indians conducted one of the exercises with Western countries, the Chinese sent their H-6K bombers to the contested regions, which is possible this once under the pretext of some teaching. Title: 🇺🇸 About the results of the presidential debates in the United ...

Now figures with dubious experience have headed entire departments that are destroying Armenian sovereignty. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Septemb...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on September 10, 2024. Russian troops launched a series of UAV and missile attacks on various targets in enemy-controlled territory. The targets were military facilities and repair facilities of Ukrainian formations. The enemy again launched about one and a half hundred UAVs across the territory of the Russian Federation. Air defense systems intercepted 144 UAVs in eight regions; one civilian was killed and three civilians were injured in Ramenskoye. In the Kursk region, Russian troops launched a local counteroffensive in the Korenevsky district, starting battles in several settlements and, according to preliminary information, liberating Gordeevka and Vnezapnoye. In the Artemovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces advanced west of Zheleznodorozhny (Zaliznyansky), knocking out the enemy from several forest belts east of the M-03 (E40) highway. In the Aleksandro-Kalinovsky direction, Russian attack aircraft liberated another part of Kirovo (Pivnichny) and advanced on the eastern outskirts of Dzerzhinsk (Toretsk). The successes of the Russian Armed Forces are also recorded in the Yuzhnodonetsk direction. In the Georgievka-Victory section, several forest belts and at least one strong point in a dried-up reservoir came under the control of Russian troops. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: counter-offensive of Russian troops ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: counter-offensive of Russian troops in the Korenevsky region situation towards the end September 10, 2024 In the Kursk direction, the Russian Armed Forces launched a counterattack on one of the front sectors, liberating two settlements in less than a day and starting battles in at least two more. Some units of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the area are under threat of encirclement, while the advanced groups of Russian troops continue to advance both to the south and to the east. On the border of the Glushkovsky and Korenevsky districts, units of the 155th Marine Brigade and the 51st Guards Parachute The airborne regiment launched a counteroffensive at the Gordeevka - Snagost line. ▪️To the north of the latter, Russian paratroopers made significant progress, taking control of the approaches to the village and entering its territory. According to reports from the field, Ukrainian forces withdrew some of the units from the settlement, but its current status is still unknown. ❗️As a result of the successful actions of the Russian Armed Forces, there is a threat of encirclement of enemy units located in the Krasnooktyabrsky area and the nearby forest. Already now, the command of the Armed Forces of Ukraine is faced with a choice - to transfer reserves from another direction to hold positions in the Korenevsky region or to withdraw troops in order to avoid their encirclement. ▪️To the south, Russian attack aircraft knocked out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from some positions in Apanasovka and its environs. Our sources do not confirm the complete liberation of the settlement, however, in light of successes in other areas, the position of the Ukrainian formations defending there may become significantly more complicated in the near future. ▪️In the area of ​​the tract, on October 10, units of the Russian Armed Forces carried out a successful attack, knocking out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from several positions in the area of ​​the settlement. It is not possible to assess the scale of the promotion due to the lack of personnel from the field. ▪️Also, Russian troops, during a series of attacks, knocked out the enemy from several positions north and south of Byakhovo, taking the enemy units there into a semi-encirclement. At the moment, the village is rather in a gray zone; it is not possible to confirm information about its release. ▪️Units of the Russian Armed Forces liberated Vnezapne and Gordeevka, and also started fighting for Viktorovka. In the latter, at the moment, according to information from the field, the presence of Ukrainian formations may remain. Nevertheless, they are also under the threat of semi-encirclement, which makes it likely that the village will come under the control of the Russian Armed Forces in the near future. 🔻The situation in the Sudzhansky district has not undergone significant changes. Ukrainian formations launched several attacks in the area of ​​Cherkasy Konopelka, Kamyshevka, Maryevka and Borok, but were not successful. Title: 🔁🎬🖼 ❗️ A local stand-up comedy came into the field of view of ...
Description: Forwarded From Operational reports❗️ Nizhny Novgorod law enforcement officers came to the attention of a local stand-up comedian and blogger, Dima Gavrilov, who, frightened by mobilization, fled to Georgia for a long time. There he blabbed a lot of unnecessary things, pleasing the Tbilisi local audience with Russophobic jokes (see the clip of his -jokes-). After a while, Dmitry, by the way, a reserve officer of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, decided to return to touring Russia. Further according to the classics - detention and repentance for sins, cancellation of the tour. On September 8, Gavrilov wanted to hold a whole concert at the concert venue -DKRT-. But alas, before the concert the comedian was detained and by a court decision found guilty of committing an administrative offense under Art. 20.3.1 Code of Administrative Offenses of the Russian Federation. He was sentenced to 13 days of administrative arrest. From now on, he and his colleagues will think about what is acceptable to joke about and what is unacceptable! Unfortunately, many such broadcasters and bloggers are replacing freedom of expression with permissiveness! Now Dima personally has 13 days to think about a new repertoire.🎯 @opersvodki

Title: 🇰🇷🇯🇵 On the future of relations between Japan and South Korea...
Description: 🇰🇷🇯🇵 On the future of relations between Japan and South Korea Last week, Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida held his 12th meeting with South Korean President Yoon Seok Yeol. Negotiations between the leaders were probably the last - the fact is that at the end of September in Japan there will be elections for the leader of the ruling Liberal Democratic Party, in which Kishida is not taking part. At the meeting, grandiloquent statements were made about the importance of further development of relations between Tokyo and Seoul. Let us recall that the rapprochement of the countries began under pressure from Washington in March 2023 and not without enthusiasm on the part of the South Korean leader. The future of bilateral ties now remains unknown due to the elections in Japan. However, most likely, the change in the Japanese leader will not lead to a setback in relations. The development of ties with Seoul fits the main foreign policy priorities of the United States and Japan, which includes developing a response to the North Korean threat. Of course, if the post of Japanese Prime Minister is taken by a more conservative politician, relations between Tokyo and Seoul may be shaken. However, given the South Korean president's flexibility when it comes to Japan's past, the two sides are likely to find an option to further develop ties. Moreover, for Yun, the restoration of relations with Tokyo is almost the most important foreign policy achievement, which his administration will not simply abandon. #Republic of Korea #Japan@rybar with @awaken_dragonSupport us ReutersJapan PM Kishida seeks to solidify South Korea ties on farewell visitJapanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida arrived for a whirlwind visit to South Korea on Friday, seeking to seal a newfound partnership between the neighbors which will be tested by imminent changes of leaders in Tokyo and Washington.

Title: 🇺🇸🇯🇵 About the deployment of American medium-range missiles i...
Description: 🇺🇸🇯🇵 On the deployment of American medium-range missiles in Japan A couple of days ago, US Secretary of the Army Christine Warmuth announced Washington’s intentions to deploy a Typhon missile launcher in Japan, capable of launching medium-range missiles. It is not yet clear when such plans will be implemented - what is clear is that American equipment will arrive on Japanese territory as part of the exercises. These are the first such statements about the deployment of missiles in Japan made by leading US officials. Back in April, we assumed that Typhon would arrive in the region, but then the choice fell on the Philippines. Obviously, the United States now wants to test the missile launcher under different conditions. 🔻A couple of important points remain unclear, the details of which we will most likely find out after some time. Firstly, at least the approximate location of the missile system is unknown. If it is deployed on the territory of Okinawa, the missiles will be able to reach the eastern part of China and almost the entire territory of the DPRK. If placed further north, the radius may also include the territory of the Russian Far East. Secondly, will Typhon be removed from Philippine territory. Yes, the system is due to go home after the completion of the Salaknib exercise evaluation in September. However, back in the summer, the Philippine authorities gave themselves some room to maneuver, mentioning that Typhon could remain in the future if necessary. Title: 🔁🖼 A logical facility designed for transporting goods to...

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Ukrainian UAV raid on Russian regions, what is known ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Raid of Ukrainian UAVs on Russian regions what is known by 12:00 September 10, 2024 Last night, Ukrainian formations carried out a massive attack on Russian regions. Air defense forces intercepted 144 enemy drones in eight regions of the country, and there were no casualties. ▪️The largest number of targets were destroyed in the airspace of the Bryansk region - air defense forces shot down 72 drones. According to available data, no destruction or casualties have been recorded in the region. ▪️In the Moscow region, UAF drones damaged two residential buildings in Ramenskoye. As a result of the explosion on Sportivny Proezd, a civilian was killed and three other people were injured. In the first entrance of the building, destruction was recorded in 54 apartments out of 102, while no damage to load-bearing structures was detected. The second strike hit a house on Vysokovoltnaya Street, where the UAV damaged several balconies on the ninth floor. Some of the drone debris fell near the building, emergency services carried out demining. More than 40 city residents are now staying in temporary accommodation centers, and they are being provided with all the necessary assistance. ❗️Local authorities are assessing the damage received and, according to the regional governor, have pledged to help restore all facilities damaged during the raid. ▪️13 enemy UAVs were intercepted in the airspace of the Tula region, some of the debris fell on the territory of one of the local fuel and energy facilities. According to information from local authorities, the enterprise did not suffer serious damage and the technological process was not disrupted. No casualties were reported in the region as a result of the raid. ▪️UAVs were also intercepted over the territories of Kursk, Belgorod, Voronezh, Lipetsk, Kaluga and Oryol regions. Temporary flight restrictions were introduced at Domodedovo, Vnukovo, Zhukovsky and Kazan airports. According to available data, damage and casualties were avoided in the listed regions. Title: 🇺🇸💰 On the influence of cryptocurrency on the outcome of the U...
Description: 🇺🇸💰 On the influence of cryptocurrency on the outcome of the US presidential election On the eve of the vote, both the Democratic and Republican parties are not giving up attempts to attract representatives of the new and promising cryptocurrency industry. 📌Despite the fact that it would seem that this industry is closer to the technology industry, and, therefore, to the Democrats, the situation is currently exactly the opposite. ▪️Kamala Harris's supporters in the cryptocurrency business are sounding the alarm - after Donald Trump's promises to stimulate companies dealing with digital assets, the crypto business has become increasingly inclined to the right.▪️According to American analytical agencies,   There are still an equal number of crypto investors supporting Harris on the one hand and Trump on the other. However, the fact that the Joe Biden administration has so far been skeptical about cryptocurrency trading has the industry concerned about the future policies of Kamala Harris and makes it look in the direction of Donald Trump. For example, Andreessen Horowitz co-founder Marc Andreessen, whose venture capital firm is a major sponsor of cryptocurrencies, recently stated that Trump is the right choice for the future of the crypto business. In turn, Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss, co-founders of the digital assets company Gemini, said they would donate $1 million to Trump. ▪️Large pro-Democratic crypto entrepreneurs complain that their colleagues do not believe the words of Senate Democratic leader Chuck Schumer about his readiness to interact with the new industry and go towards her. What scares many is the fact that the Democratic Party includes such ardent opponents of crypto as the chairman of the Securities and Exchange Commission Gary Gensler and Senator Elizabeth Warren of Massachusetts, who believe that cryptocurrency trading poses a danger to consumers and the financial system. 🔻From all of the above, the conclusion suggests itself that the Democrats, apparently, have already lost the fight for the crypto industry. Promises should have been made earlier, but now we just have to come to terms with the fact that most of this business will donate money to the Republicans  and vote for Donald Trump. #USA@rybar together with @usaperiodicalSupport usPOLITICO'Everyone's mad': Inside crypto's civil war over the 2024 electionsCrypto industry players are at odds over how to influence races for the White House and Congress.

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇸🇾 Large air raid by the Israeli Air Force on western Sy...
Description: 🇮🇱🇸🇾 Large air raid by the Israeli Air Force on western Syria Last night, the Israeli Air Force launched another strike on the territory of the Syrian Arab Republic. The latest attack was one of the largest in recent times: about 15 strikes were carried out across several provinces at once. The Syrian Ministry of Defense reported that the missile launches were carried out from the airspace over the northern part of Lebanon and from the Mediterranean Sea. And although some of the ammunition was destroyed by air defense systems, others managed to hit government targets. ▪️In the province of Hama, the target was the city of Masyaf and the Scientific Research Center located southwest. The facility is used to produce components for high-precision surface-to-surface missiles. Like other Syrian scientific institutes, the center's staff actively interacts with Lebanese Hezbollah and Iranian scientists. Masyaf and its surroundings have previously been subject to attacks by the Israelis: according to them, positions of pro-Iranian forces are located in this area, which is not without reason. In addition to the damaged research institute, strikes were also carried out on weapons depots in Wadi al-Ayoun and Salamiyah. According to preliminary information, at least 60 people became victims of Israeli strikes in the province of Hama, 16 of whom died.▪️A convoy of military equipment was attacked in Tartus. According to some reports, armed Shiite formations are stationed in this area, fighting on the side of the Syrian army. ▪️Messages about strikes on Damascus are also spreading on the Internet, but there is no confirmation of this. It is likely that the explosions were mistaken for the work of Syrian air defense crews. Earlier last summer, the IDF Air Force attacked the positions of the Syrian armed forces several times, including destroying air defense systems. At the moment, the Syrians are armed with short-range Pantsir-S1 air defense missile systems, which allows Israeli aircraft to carry out strikes deep in Syrian territory. Title: 🇰🇿🇬🇧✈️ Where Kazakhstan is flying A record...
Description: 🇰🇿🇬🇧✈️ Where Kazakhstan is flying In Kazakhstan, a record number of aircraft were imported in six months - 13 aircraft with a capacity of 50 to 300 people. The main suppliers of equipment were France and Ireland, supplying six and four aircraft, respectively. Two more planes arrived from the USA and one from Germany. ▪️It cost $656 million, with an average price of one aircraft of $50.5 million. At the same time, a record number of aircraft were also taken out of the Republic of Kazakhstan - 10, of which seven flew to Ireland.▪️Thanks to its geography, Kazakhstan after Russia banned flights airlines from unfriendly countries began to claim the title of logistics hub. The desire for this is shown by the numbers of flights served by Kazaeronavigation: more than 415 thousand flights, of which about 107 thousand were on Kazakh and 308 thousand on foreign airlines, which was a record for Kazakhstan. ▪️Astana is definitely striving to expand its flight geography. In addition to the fact that Air Astana and Japan Airlines have signed a codeshare agreement (agreement on joint operation of one route), according to which they will share a new flight from Almaty to Tokyo, the launch of the Astana - New York flight is planned for the end of 2025 . ▪️It is for this reason that specialists from the US Federal Civil Aviation Administration began checking the country’s readiness to open direct flights between Kazakhstan and the States, and Kazakhstan was the first Central Asian country to open a permanent representative office in the International Civil Aviation Association (ICAO).📌An interesting touch: until February 2024, 49% of Air Astana shares belonged to the British BAE Systems, and the chief executive officer of the carrier is a British citizen, Commander of the Order of the British Empire, Peter Foster. However, recently a scandal around the airline has been gaining momentum: more and more details of flight cancellations and scandals with passengers are appearing in the press, and even hail at the Astana airport manages to damage exclusively the planes of this carrier, photos of which are immediately leaked to bloggers. 🔻Added to this was the radical statement by the Chairman of the Civil Aviation Committee of Kazakhstan that Air Astana does not and did not have official status as a national carrier. At the same time, Air Astana has always positioned itself as a nationalist and even used this term in its marketing materials. ❗️While -purely British- and other Western airlines are refusing flights to China due to the need to fly over Russia and rising costs, London has resolved the logistics issue through a -partner-. But the statement of the KGA may indicate that the authorities of the Republic of Kazakhstan are planning to review aviation policy from the position of newly acquired strength. And create or declare 100% of the national carrier, while depriving the joint company with the UK of the opportunity to skim all the cream.#Kazakhstan #CentralAsia@rybar Support usKazakhstanskaya PravdaA record number of passenger aircraft was imported by Kazakhstan in six months. As a result of 6 months, 13 aircraft with a capacity of 50 or more were purchased abroad up to 300 people, a Kazpravda.kz correspondent reports with reference to the DATA HUB. Such a number of aircraft was not purchased as in January-June of this year.

Title: 🖼 🇨🇩 About the attempt to escape from prison in Kinshasa Again...
Description: 🇨🇩 About an attempt to escape from prison in Kinshasa Against the background of other events, an interesting incident that occurred in the capital of the Democratic Republic of Congo on September 2 went unnoticed. Several hundred inmates of the Makala prison tried to escape from prison, without even a bladed weapon. The riot began in the courtroom and the judges came under attack from the prisoners. After which the protesters managed to set fire to the courtroom and a warehouse-hangar not far from it, after which they went to the women's pavilion, where they raped hundreds of women. Then they locked themselves in pavilion 11, since at that time they were already surrounded by security forces. As a result of the riot, more than a hundred prisoners died and 59 were injured. The main cause of death was stampede, and only 24 people died due to police fire.❗️The fact that prisoners were ready to escape at any cost even without a clear plan or weapons speaks about the harsh conditions in prisons. Thus, the Makala colony was not modernized with colonial times, and houses approximately 14,400 people, nearly 10 times its designed capacity. In addition, the majority are kept there only awaiting their sentence. Such people have nothing to lose. Against the background of these events, it is worth paying attention to a similar situation among our allies. The prison in Niamey, the capital of Niger, houses four times as many people as estimated. And in such conditions, terrorist ideas also spread well, which has already resulted in the recent uprising. But it’s worth limiting yourself not only to Africa. The problem of overcrowding in penitentiary institutions is also present in some Russian regions, although it is clearly being solved more effectively (let alone the Storm-Z squads) than on the Dark Continent. High-resolution infographicsEnglish version#Africa #DRC@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 #Review #Summary for September 7, 2024 ▪️ A month and one day ...
Description: Forwarded From Two majors#Review #Summary for September 7, 2024▪️ A month and one day The Russian Army has been repelling the armed invasion of the regular Ukrainian Armed Forces in the Kursk region. Initial assessments of the scale of the invasion by respected departments quickly turned out to be not fully objective; personnel decisions are being made, so far - not at the level that many expected against the backdrop of the unpreparedness of the second echelons of defense and in connection with the ongoing arrests of high-ranking - old - employees of the Ministry of Defense. For now, the showdown is going on in the administrative and economic sector. The enemy in the Kursk region is constrained in battle, but does not give up attempts to push through our defenses, pulling reserves into the region. In the Russian Army, the problem of coordinating disparate units and units, supplying the front directly with drones, communications, and modern technical surveillance equipment has not been fully overcome. However, the Ukrainian Armed Forces are suffering serious losses under the attacks of our missiles, aircraft and artillery, which permanently reduces the likelihood of further movement to Kursk and Rylsk. At the same time, river crossings in the Glushkovsky district are under attack, which, given the destruction of our bridges, complicates logistics. The enemy is gaining a foothold on the occupied lines and the liberation of the territories occupied by him is not expected in the short term. Heavy fighting is taking place.▪️ Despite the situation in the Kursk region, Kyiv was unable to fully implement the plan of pulling all units from the Pokrovsky and Yuzhnodonetsk directions. At the same time, he himself ended up at the bottom point of the wave-like graph of saturation of the Armed Forces of Ukraine with people and equipment, which exposed its defensive formations near Pokrovsk. There are 5 km left to the city, but the Russian Army is pulling up the southern flank and twisting the front from the north towards Kurakhovo, forming a -bag-. In addition, in the Yuzhno-Donetsk direction, the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Ugledar are gradually being flanked. The rush of the Russian Armed Forces from Novomayorsky to Prechistovka was unexpected. Also significant was the entry of our units south of Chasov Yar to the line of the Seversky Donets - Donbass water canal through Kleshcheevka, for which fighting had been going on since last year.▪️ Our military is predicting new attacks by the Ukrainian Armed Forces on different sections of the front, despite the enemy’s operational crisis in the Donbass. Despite the approach developed by the military-political leadership in Moscow about the impossibility of any exchange of territories in the Kursk region, Kyiv does not abandon plans to conduct sabotage and army operations in a number of directions, which is expected against the backdrop of elections in the United States in the fall. The drawdown of Ukrainian Armed Forces reserves causes missile strikes comparable in significance to the destruction of hundreds of Ukrainian military personnel at a military university in Poltava, but the enemy has never taken into account the loss of personnel. ▪️ There is no question of stopping military-technical assistance to Kyiv by the West. Europe, under US pressure, is preparing to transfer dozens of Leopard tanks, air defense systems and other equipment. The trophies of our troops in the Kursk region show that the invasion group of the Ukrainian Armed Forces was largely supported by NATO, which once again indicates the direct involvement of the Alliance in the war with Russia. The shelling of Kursk, Belgorod, and the DPR with Western weapons and the promotion of information about permission to fire air-launched missiles into our territories to greater depths also demonstrate that the North Atlantic Alliance does not experience any discomfort about the escalation of the conflict, while continuing to conduct military exercises near our borders, preparing their countries to mobilize and rebuild military factories.▪️ There are no grounds for a quick end to the war. There are still many difficult days left before achieving the stated and periodically changing goals of the NDC, which range from complete denazification and demilitarization of all of Ukraine to the liberation of the territories of new regions from the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Meanwhile, the West is trying to destroy our military and economic potential against Ukraine and undermine the internal political situation, which could be an even more serious threat to Russia. And the liberation of the Kursk region is not expected in the coming week. The war will be long. Summary compiled by: Two majors

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsko-Kurakhovskoe direction: the offensive of Ru...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsko-Kurakhovskoe direction: the offensive of Russian troops on Kurakhovo and the liberation of the northwestern outskirts of Krasnogorovkasituation towards the end of September 6, 2024 In the Pokrovsko-Kurakhovskoe direction, Russian troops are gradually approaching Kurakhovo, the key transport hub of the Ukrainian Armed Forces on this section of the front. The attack aircraft are fighting on the eastern outskirts of Ukrainsk and are advancing towards Gornyak, bypassing the organized defense centers of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. ▪️In the Novogrodovka area, Ukrainian formations are making attempts to return the southwestern outskirts of the city under their control, including using heavy armored vehicles. For counterattacks, units of the 57th brigade, partly consisting of former completed ones, are used. ▪️In Selidovo, the fighting moved into the positional phase, the Ukrainian Armed Forces managed to transfer a sufficient number of troops to the populated area to organize a sustainable defense. Russian units are fighting in the area of ​​Gogol and 8th September streets, while no significant changes in the battle line have been noted. A few days ago, information appeared in the chats of local residents about the advance of attack aircraft of the Russian Armed Forces towards the central city hospital. It is likely that Russian intelligence officers were actually able to get close to the territory of the medical facility, but then retreated. At the moment, the situation in this area of ​​the city remains hidden by the fog of war. ▪️Russian troops have managed to completely occupy Lesovka over the past few days. Information about the liberation of Dolinovka, where the Russian flag was hoisted, was also confirmed. Then, relying on the occupied positions, the Russian Armed Forces launched an attack on Ukrainsk, trying to bypass the enemy’s defensive lines from the south and cut off the remaining Ukrainian Armed Forces units in the city from supplies. Russian attack aircraft knocked the enemy out of Karl Marx Street and gained a foothold on it, creating a springboard for the further liberation of the village. ❗️Some sources report the beginning of the assault by Russian troops on Gornyak, the last settlement before Kurakhovka. However, it is not possible to confirm this information with objective monitoring footage, while the testimony of local residents is quite often confused and inaccurate. ▪️To the east, Russian troops launched a series of attacks in the direction of Zhelanny First from Galitsynivka along Ivan Sereda Street, but their results remain unknown. Later, footage of a Ukrainian landing on the southern outskirts of the village, where fighting continues, appeared on the Internet.▪️The long information lull that prevailed in the Krasnogorovsky area was finally broken. Footage has appeared on the Internet showing the Russian flag on the building of the House of Culture in the private sector on the north-western outskirts of the settlement - it was there that units of the Ukrainian Armed Forces held positions for a long time, but their position significantly worsened due to the successes of the Russian Armed Forces in neighboring areas. At the same time, it is also reported that the presence of the enemy remains in this area, which is blocked in individual buildings and basements. Now Russian troops are clearing out the private sector and eliminating pockets of resistance to the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Also, Ukrainian formations retain the ability to hold defenses in a complex of farms to the west of the private sector. It is quite possible to organize the supply of this defense center using the delivery of supplies by drones.▪️To the south there are battles in the Maksimilyanovka-Georgievka sector, where Ukrainian formations are attempting to dislodge Russian units from their occupied positions. Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 Artemovsk direction: a breakthrough to the Seversky Donets - Donbass canal near Kleshcheevka and battles in the Oktyabrsky microdistrict in Chasov Yare. Situation as of 14:00 on September 6, 2024. In the Artemovsk direction, Russian troops continue to advance simultaneously on several sectors of the front. After the relative stabilization of the line of contact, the Russian Armed Forces significantly expanded the zone of control at both Chasov Yar and Kleshcheevka, which became possible, among other things, thanks to the transfer of Ukrainian units to the Kursk direction.▪️In the Bogdanovka area, Russian troops advanced several kilometers to the west and gained a foothold on the outskirts of Grigorovka. The strategically important height 215 also came under the control of Russian troops, the battles for which lasted for several months. The large stronghold and the adjacent forest plantations are under the stable control of Russian troops. ❗️Yesterday, objective evidence of the presence of the Russian Armed Forces appeared directly on the territory of the Seversky Donets - Donbass canal, almost three kilometers southwest of height 215, which would have been impossible without maintaining the elevation. So far, only a single soldier of the Russian troops has been captured by the enemy, but the very fact of advancement is an important prerequisite for the future alignment of the front line along the canal at the Kurdyumovka - Andreevka line. Title: 🇰🇿🇺🇿🇦🇿🇹🇷 Should there be a Pan-Turkic Netflix? Representa...
Description: 🇰🇿🇺🇿🇦🇿🇹🇷 Should there be a Pan-Turkic Netflix? Representatives of film organizations of Turkic countries signed a memorandum on the creation of a unified film and media platform during the TURKSOY forum in Samarkand. On this platform, content consumers will have access to film and media products produced by countries participating in the international organization of Turkic culture - Azerbaijan, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Turkmenistan, Turkey and Uzbekistan.❓What does Netflix have to do with leaving Russia? Namely, a well-known service began its journey with a single platform, the business model of which is now considered exemplary. Having started by providing access to thousands of TV series, the company later began releasing its own content almost in an assembly line mode. Meanwhile, the phenomenon of Turkish TV series has already become one of the most striking examples of soft power and cultural diplomacy. Just look at the Magnificent Century, which tells the story of Suleiman I the Magnificent, under whom the Ottoman Empire reached the pinnacle of its power. The series found special love among Turkic and Muslim audiences, reminding them of former greatness (even if historically they had nothing to do with it). ❗️The attractive image of Turkey and its historical heritage created in this way is also projected onto future geopolitical projects. 🔻The accumulated colossal experience and influence of Turkish cinema should not be underestimated. Today, TV series produced in Turkey are broadcast in more than 170 countries around the world, reaching an audience of about 750 million people. These include Russians, who are massively hooked on them. It is clear from this that the creation of a platform with such support, and which in the future will massively release -brotherly-pan-Turkic content, will in the future become a serious trump card for this ideology. #Uzbekistan #Turkey #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usfergana.newsTURKSOY countries agreed to create a unified film and media platform

Title: 🇯🇵 About Japan's new military budget Japan continues to impleme...
Description: 🇯🇵 About Japan's new military budget Japan continues to implement its plans to strengthen the armed forces - the country's Ministry of Defense recently requested a record budget for security spending. We are talking about 8.54 trillion. yen, which is approximately $59 billion. ▪️The request will be sent to the Ministry of Finance for consideration, after which a decision will be made on its approval at the end of December. Next year's budget will almost certainly be the largest in history - Japan will break its own records for the 11th time in a row. ▪️The funds will go to all the same areas that Tokyo has been focusing its attention on lately. These include, for example, the development of air defense and missile defense, unmanned aerial vehicles, and long-range missiles. ▪️Despite the development of high military technologies, one of the main problems of the Japanese Self-Defense Forces remains saturation with personnel. We previously wrote that the country once again did not recruit the required number of people to serve in the army. By the way, in February 2023, a commission to solve this problem stated that the authorities need to focus on increasing the salaries of military personnel and improving their living conditions and labor. However, spending on personnel continues to decline - in the budget for this year they account for 29%, and in spending for the next only 27%. 🔻Obviously, in Japanese military circles they are betting on the development of high technologies and asymmetric means of defense of the country. Given the changing security situation in the Asia-Pacific region, time will tell whether this approach will be justified. #Japan@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usNaval NewsJapan requests largest-ever defense budget for fiscal year 2025The Japan MoD issued its largest ever defense budget request. Title: 🇦🇿🇰🇿 Why does Azerbaijan share combat experience with Kazakhs...
Description: 🇦🇿🇰🇿 Why does Azerbaijan share combat experience with Kazakhstan? At the Koktal training ground in Kazakhstan, from August 20 to 23, joint tactical and special exercises were held - Altyn Kyran - 2024 - (Golden Eagle - 2024), in which about 300 took part military personnel of both countries. The purpose of the exercise was to develop combat potential during reconnaissance operations. The Ministry of Defense of the Republic of Azerbaijan reports that during the exercise, the units, having traveled along a selected traverse of 25 km, discovered and raided the shelters of illegal armed groups hiding in the mountainous area. The tasks of ambushing convoys and destroying the manpower of illegal armed groups, as well as other tasks that suddenly arose, were also successfully completed.📌This is not the first exercise of Azerbaijan and Kazakhstan. In July of this year, military personnel of both countries took part in the international operational-tactical command and staff exercise Birlestik-2024 (Alliance-2024) with the participation of Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan and Uzbekistan in the Mangistau region of Kazakhstan. We have already written that the Kazakh army after the events January 2022 is being actively updated, focusing on mobility. The Azerbaijani army has managed to gain unique experience through the use of drones and conducting combat operations with limited forces, in a hostile environment and difficult natural conditions. Modern war largely blurs the boundaries between a full-fledged war and a counter-terrorist operation, so Kazakhstan’s interest here is understandable. The question is against whom the acquired skills will be used. Well, another goal of the event, as well as the Birlestik-2024 exercises, which is not obvious at first glance, is the militarization of the Organization of Turkic States in the interests of Ankara, where they are actively lobbying for the promotion of their weapons and creation of a supranational military Alliance in the region.#Kazakhstan  #Azerbaijan #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇦🇿🇰🇿🇰🇬🇺🇿 About the exercise -Alliance-2024-Meanwhile, the day before yesterday, the multinational exercise -Birlestik-2024-, which can also be called -Alliance-, started in Kazakhstan. In the current video, the document cannot fully restrain China's ambitions in the South China Sea. And although it is not clear whether the Americans will agree to a revision, certain trends are visible here. For example, the 2023 Indo-Pacific Command report interprets armed attack extremely broadly. The wording actually includes the use of water cannons - the Chinese’s favorite means of pushing the Filipinos out to sea. The issue of revision is directly related to the US-China confrontation, and if the stakes increase, significant amendments may be made to the agreement. However, judging by the rhetoric of the Americans and the Chinese, there is no talk of escalation yet: this may mean that revising the agreement will remain only a dream of the Philippine authorities for now. #China #USA #Philippines@rybar with @awaken_dragonSupport usPhilippine News AgencyReview of PH-US defense treaty amid 'new security challenges'MANILA – The National Maritime Council (NMC) believes it is about time the Philippines and the United States (US ) review their over seven-decades-old Mutual Defense Treaty (MDT) to make it more responsive to the modern security landscape.
